title: Speech Trainer
description:
Speech Trainer allows you to record and play your voice with minimal overhead. It is a useful aid for learning foreign languages, training pronunciation and diction or treating speech disorders. Speech Trainer automatically recognizes when a complete word or a sentence is recorded. Interaction overhead is minimal - just say a word and the application plays it back, general purpose recording applications require several pushes of buttons to accomplish the same task. You can also switch to interactive mode (use the Android menu button) to fully control when recording is terminated. This is useful in a noisy environment, or when you are practicing long sentences. In the interactive mode, push and hold the top area of the screen to record, release to play what was recorded.

Speech Trainer offers full functionality for free with no ads and minimal permissions required. It is free software released under the GNU General Public License.

title: JABtalk
description:
JABtalk is a free speech communication application designed to help non-verbal children and adults communicate.  Speech therapists commonly refer to JABtalk as an easy and effective augmentative and alternative communication (AAC) device.  By combining personalized voice and images with an extremely simple user interface, JABtalk delivers a speech solution that is both fun to use and easy to learn. Originally designed as a communication tool for children with special needs, JABtalk has evolved into a communication tool used by special needs children, stroke patients, toddlers, speech-language pathologists, and others. 

Some of JABtalk features include:
-Navigation designed to be intuitive for toddlers
-Build sentences from words
-Organize words into user-defined categories for simple navigation
-Heptic feedback (vibration) when touching a word or category for immediate physical feedback
-Ability to rearrange and resize pictures
-Download unlimited number pictures from internet directly into JABtalk!
-Ability to capture pictures directly from your device's camera
-Ability to import pictures from your device's memory card
-Ability to record your own audio for words using your devices microphone.
-Ability to import audio files from a memory card
-Supports text-to-speech if you don't want to record or import your own audio files
-Easy to use passcode protected administrative tools for managing words and categories
-Fullscreen mode to prevent kids from easily exiting app
-Easily backup/restore your data to preserve your changes or move your entire dataset to a different device
-Online tutorials at http://www.jabstone.com/videos 


If you are using JABtalk as an AAC device for an individual with special needs (down syndrome, autism, etc...), we strongly recommend having the individual assessed by a speech-language pathologist to ensure JABtalk is the most appropriate solution for the the individual's needs.

title: Virginia helps the disabled
description:
For a best experience, use Google TTS Speech engine.

The app transforms your tablet or smartphone into a communicator.
Useful for those who have difficulty using language as a communication channel.
The app is useful in case of congenital disabilities, acquired and/or temporary, allowing through the speech of the device on which it is installed, a fast voice prompt, communicating effectively problems, needs and requests.

A communicator useful also for those people who have had their vocal chords removed and for hospitalized inpatients who are unable to speak the english language.

Available a simple mode for severe disability.

One of the 2013 best app: Productivity  - for the Christopher & Dana Reeve Foundation.

title: AutiSpark: Games for Kids with Autism
description:
AutiSpark is a one-of-a-kind educational app for children with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) with specially designed learning games and approved by experts. If you are struggling to teach basic concepts to your child, AutiSpark is a must-try for you.

AutiSpark offers a multitude of well-researched, engaging and interactive learning games carefully designed to suit the child's learning requirements. Includes concepts of picture association, understanding emotions, recognition of sounds and much more.

‚úì Suitable for children with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD).
‚úì Specially designed educational games and activities.
‚úì Engaging content to ensure the child's focus and attention.
‚úì Develop basic visual, communication, and language skills.

How Are These Learning Games Different?
These educational games are specially made by considering the various needs of kids on the autistic spectrum, with the help and guidance of therapists. It includes positive reinforcement that kids need to learn and remember. These autism games are created keeping the fundamental concepts in mind to help kids learn the basic skills needed on a daily basis.

Words & Spellings:
It can be challenging to teach reading skills to children with autism. Our early reading comprehension will focus on recognizing letters, letter combinations & words.

Basic Math Skills:
AutiSpark will make math fun with specially designed learning games which are easy to understand and play. Children will learn math concepts in an easy way.

Tracing Games:
Writing is an important skill that every young child needs to master. AutiSpark will teach uppercase and lowercase letters of the alphabet, numbers and shapes.

Memory Games:
Kids will sharpen their memory and cognitive skills by playing fun and educational memory games. There will be different levels of difficulty to suit the child's needs.

Sorting Games:
AutiSpark will teach kids to identify the similarities and differences easily. Kids will learn to categorize and organize different objects.

Matching Games:
The ability to understand and recognize different objects will help children to develop the sense of logic.

Puzzles:
Puzzle games will help children to improve problem-solving skills, mental speed and thought process. 

Want your child to learn essential skills? Download AutiSpark - Autism Games now!

title: Deaf Communication (talk to deaf& hard of hearing)
description:
Gone are the days when you needed to write down everything on a piece of paper or learn sign languages to communicate with deaf and hearing impaired people.This speech to text app was made specifically as a conversation platform and not as a speech dictation platform to communicate efficiently and as quickly as possible with people who don't know sign language.Whenever you want to hear something from someone,just tell them to speak to the phone,the app then automatically generates the voice into text so that you can read what they are trying say.Also,the app deletes the previous text automatically when they say something new(So that it doesn't seem like you are reading a book with a bunch of text).if you want talk back then write on the app whatever you want to say and press the speaker button(on the right side of the mic button) and it will generate the text to speech.


Features:
-No more tan 3 ads per day
=Two way communication(speech to text and text to speech).
-it supports over 140 different languages
-Users are given the freedom of selecting a text size of their own choice
-There is an offline mode to access the voice to text app offline by downloading and installing languages(only in pro version)
-Users can copy the text to clipboard
-A simple and beautiful user interface.

title: Sounds Essentials - Learn and Identify Sounds
description:
Sounds Essentials is a speech therapy app designed and developed to increase sound recognition and listening skills in children. The app has 4 engaging and beautiful activities, each of which is used to develop Auditory Discrimination skills in children. 

Sounds essentials is a perfect blend of education with entertainment. This edutainment application can be used by SLPs and speech therapies during therapy sessions to enable children build auditory memory and recognition skills. The fun and engaging interface of the app makes it enjoyable for toddlers all the way from preschoolers to kindergarten. The App features exciting activities for children to explore thousands of objects by swiping left or right and listen to their sounds.  

Sounds Essentials enables young learners to differentiate between sounds of different objects. This function which is commonly known as ‚ÄúAuditory Discrimination‚Äù helps in building sound or ‚ÄúAuditory Memory‚Äù among students. The app has separate activities for both the functions enabling better sound recognition and listening skills. Children having problems in sequencing the sounds they hear during speech therapy sessions such as articulation & writing can benefit from the content based on Auditory Sequencing within the app.

This app is designed in collaboration with speech therapists, parents and teachers who are looking to expand children‚Äôs listening & sound discrimination skills. This app is intended for children of ages 2-8 years old.

With different Sound games children improve their skills by matching objects and their associated sounds.

WHY PARENTS AND TEACHERS LOVE THIS APP

‚Ä¢ The app is fun, super easy to use for kids of all ages and all abilities
‚Ä¢ Explore different sounds through flash cards containing real life images of everyday items and learn their sounds and appearance
‚Ä¢ Different Sound games improve skills by matching objects and their associated sounds.
‚Ä¢ You can turn individual features in different activities, ON or OFF and introduce features differently.
‚Ä¢ Sounds are grouped into 6 selectable categories Animals, Machines, Nature, Actions, Transport and Instruments.
‚Ä¢ Wrong answers do not interfere with gameplay.

The app has 4 engaging and beautiful activities:

* Know the Sound
* Match the Sound
* Find the Sound
* Sound Hunt

Other features

* Timer
* Multiple Users
* Leader board

Please share your suggestions & feedback on feedback@soundsessentials.com

Google+ : https://plus.google.com/u/0/107302410009075383713

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/articulationessentials

Twitter: https://twitter.com/articulationess

OR via Reviews Below

title: speech and memory therapy
description:
Language supported so far: English, Francais.
SpeechParole is an application for people suffering aphasia or alzheimer. It has functions such as: image recognition and diction, words exercises, praxis, diction, mathematics, text and song reading/singing and score history.
It can cope with multiple patients so it is particularly designed for speech therapists.

It consists of the following modules:
-Calendar: this helps the patient to remember his/her appointments.

-Images: it has several categories such as animals, professions, sea, food, tools and misc. The user must recognize images. He can be helped by characters/syllables using voice.

-Exercises: this is based on multiple words exercises such as find the word, complete the idiom, find the intruder and some categorization games.

-Mirror: this is about praxis. It is a set of exercises of face's movement to help recover from paralysis. The patient has a camera component to mirror the moves.

-Voice: in this module there are texts and songs to practice the diction. Both can be recorded such as measuring progresses weeks over weeks. There is also a function to keep track of the difficult words to pronounce. Translations help recover a foreign language. Finally, the patient can measure his diction speed.

-Diction: speaking to the device the system helps recover the right pronunciation. It can be simple words or phrases through idioms.

-Memory: it consists of several memory games/exercises such as images sequencing, Kipling game (object memory), words memory, path/visual memory, couples, mixed shapes and numbers sequencing.

-Mathematics: it includes several games/exercises such as calculation, writing numbers in letter and re-ordering a list of numbers.

-Score: it shows global results and percentage, and detailed results by exercise over the week, month and year.

-Options: finally this module allows to set the language (English and French for now), the levels, the voice level and also submit problems and feedback.

Each module consists of swiping Tabs. The first Tab explains how the sub modules work.

title: Autism Speech Sequencing ZApps 1.0
description:
Sequencing is the first fun step to narrative speech, something most Autistic children struggle with. 

This App grew out of Special Education Kindergarten classroom curriculum, where he was cutting and pasting the sequences onto paper. 

For my son, I wanted to make it colorful, fun and full of audio and visual feedback to help him and then other children in his classroom learn sequencing, and take turtle steps towards speech and communication. 


Play is powerful.
ZApps Sequencing game play teaches a child narrative speech through:

1.	How the world works
2.	Storytelling: How one thing leads to another - first, second, third and so on. How to tell a simple story, that later will help them tell their daily story, narrate and successfully communicate how they feel that day or that moment. 
Repetition of sequences builds a child‚Äôs brain connections:
1.	Logical next connections: this leads to narrative speech.
2.	Time concepts--- first, second, third, fourth, last
3.	Teaches logic.
4.	Teaches recollection.
5.	Improves memory.
6.	Focuses on cognitive visually immersive tasks that will build the synaptic connections in the brain.
For children on the Spectrum, Autistic, speech delayed, impacted by Asperger‚Äôs or verbally challenged, making connections can be difficult. Attention deficit and sensory overload can make focusing difficult.  Here immersive colorful images entice challenged children to play and play will help to strengthen synaptic connections and increase speech and communication.

1.	Red and Green rectangles light up and give visual signals to the child if the sequence is correct or not. 
2.	There is a pause arrow at the end of each completed sequence, giving the child a chance to recap and verbalize the story. The teacher or parent can then also help the child by pronouncing the words slowly, articulating difficult sounds.

Unique Educational Features: 
1.	Sequencing has built in scoring.  This is based on the Boston University CARE Center‚Äôs Applications for Language Enhancement Study (AppLES.) 
2.	It lets the parent or teacher evaluate the progress of the child.
3.	It records the progress of a child.

Speech sequencing ZApps is colorful, visually immersive, audio feedback and learning rich, full of Zarrar‚Äôs voice prompting and speaking out the images.

With this App a child can succeed in sequencing, then makes connections about logic, about a story: first, second, third, then fourth.
This can be developed early on with emphasis on Speech Sequencing exercises that improve the brain‚Äôs story telling abilities of simple natural events, such as an egg to chicken, larvae to lady bug, and hopefully be a turtle step to narrating their day: breakfast cereals, to lunch, playground happenings or to school bus home.

Zarrar is the CTO ‚Äì Chief Testing Officer ‚Äì of this product, and Autistic.  It is his voice encouraging challenged children to take turtle steps on the pathway to Speech, so critical to an independent life.

This App is tiny steps, small helping hands to zap a tiny facet of the debilitating features of Autism. By zapping a tiny issue, improving speech, Zapps Zarrar and I hope will empower special needs children; provide a pathway to Speech, critical to an independent and happy life.

We have also developed ZOTTZ, Z Occupational Therapy Toolz to develop fine motor skill in challenged children.
Please support Assistive Technology for children, for our home, from our hearts, to yours. This is a first step, and we hope one of many to come.
http://www.zottz.com
http://www.zubair.com

title: Arabic Speech Trainer (AST)
description:
* This application does not need to connect to the Internet and contains all the additions by downloading it only once.
This application is designed to operate on the android system by a group of speech therapists and in collaboration with a software engineer to help individuals with speech sound problems to practice what they learn in the clinic at home. AST can also be used by older children and adults who have speech sound problems. The app uses pictures that are attractive to children to help them improve their speech sound production and in turn forms an easy home tool to supplement therapy implemented in the clinic which might minimize the duration of therapy and number of visits to the speech clinic. AST includes all the standard speech sounds in Arabic and 84 short syllables (i.e., consonant+ vowel) and includes 252 picture-word stimuli form everyday life. At the beginning of therapy, the speech therapist chooses the target sounds to train the client on in therapy at the clinic. Then, the clinician explains the use of the app to the parents and or client depending on the age of the client to help provide more training opportunities on the target sounds outside the speech clinic. This app can augment what a client is trained on at the clinic which might help accelerate gains in speech therapy. A user can choose the sound to train on by pressing the icon of the sound on the screen and then choosing the desired syllable and then choosing the words that contain the sound. We hope you find the AST app helpful and fun to use.

title: One-Minute Articulation App
description:
This app makes daily practice easy and simple because it only takes 1-minute to practice 60 or more target sounds! Fast, noticeable results in a child‚Äôs speech are seen within weeks!

Research shows that children who use High Frequency, Short Duration practice of target sounds are dismissed from speech therapy more than 8 months sooner than children in traditional programs. This app was created to give parents, teachers and Speech-Language Pathologists a way to tap into High Frequency, Short Duration drills so that every second spent with a child counts! The focus of each round, either in the practice mode or the test mode, is to elicit as many correct responses as possible from a child in the shortest amount of time to establish correct and consistent production of sounds and to change speech patterns.

Parents often report frustration in getting children to practice drills and speech homework at home but with this app it is easy to motivate a child to practice for a minute or two.

- 21 sounds
- 216 Rounds
- Word, Phrase, Sentence Levels
- Practice & Test Mode
- Easy data acquisition
- Works on Speed & Accuracy
- Simple & Easy to Use
- Unlimited profiles available
- PERFECT for Parents to use for Home Practice!
- 60+ practices in 1 minute!

This app allows a child to get right to work.  With short, intense drill practices at the word, phrase and sentence levels children learn to speak and pronounce their sounds in record time. New speech patterns are carried over into everyday life because a child uses speed and accuracy when practicing their target sounds. A must have app if you want to see fast, effective results!

--

One-Minute Articulation offers a $1.99, $3.99 monthly renewing subscription and $28.99 yearly renewing a subscription to unlock Basic and Premium functionality.

The purchase will be charged from your iTunes account if you choose to buy the One-Minute Articulation Basic and One-Minute Articulation Premium subscription. You can manage or cancel your subscription through the user settings in iTunes after the purchase. The subscription period ends with the same kind of subscription you already bought to the same price unless you turn off your subscription 24 hours before it renews. It is not possible to cancel your current subscription during the time your subscription is active. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a One-Minute Articulation Basic and One-Minute Articulation Premium subscription.

If you don‚Äôt choose to purchase One-Minute Articulation Basic and One-Minute Articulation Premium, you can still use One-Minute Articulation for free. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice.

Privacy Policy: http://fmgdenver.com/assets/Privacy-Policy-One-Minute-Articulation-App.pdf

Terms & Condition: http://fmgdenver.com/assets/Terms-And-Conditions-One-Minute-Articulation.pdf

recentChanges:
Info Screen with information on how to use this app, suggested guidelines for the practice rounds and speed levels, and tips on how to use this app for fluency and language skills

Extra Screen with additional practice rounds to supplement difficult target sounds including vocalic r and blends

Subtitle with name of app on every screen
comments: This a great app developed by an amazing speech therapist!! Her methods have worked wonders for my twins and this app is a great supplement for at home/on the go practice. Not to mention the kids get really excited to "do their words" now! My only concern with the app is that test results don't transfer from separate devices for Android users. If there was some sort of log in and out feature for the app, I believe the entries could be saved on any device the app is used on. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

What a rip off, the 'phrases' and 'sentences' are literally the same for each word in the set of sounds. For example, if you do B sentences it will be 'Bob will beg for a big banana', and then 'Bob will beg for a big ball'. Saying the exact same sentence with one word difference is ridiculous. Don't buy.

I signed up for the free trial and couldn't hear any sound. I then subscribed for a paid version even though I still had the free subscription, and still no sound coming out from the app. I sent a mail to you yesterday about this and I haven't gotten a response. It's getting really frustrating!!!!

The One-minute Articulation app is an all in one speech app. It introduces vocabulary, allows the student to practice and test fluency of words and word phrases. As a parent it gives you a clear understanding of where your student is verbally and how to help your student communicate.

A very fast, simple and easy yet effective way to train children to say and practice their sounds correctly. My kid loves to see her results and all the sounds she has done! This is a fabulous way to teach speech to children!

title: Logopedia 3 : ejercicios de articulaci√≥n, espa√±ol
description:
www.logopedia-ejercicios.es

Esta aplicaci√≥n est√° dise√±ada para todos los ni√±os y adultos que tienen dificultades en la articulaci√≥n de algunos fonemas. Adem√°s de acudir a logopedia, est√° aplicaci√≥n supone un apoyo importante, para realizar en casa, con im√°genes y juegos divertidos. Esto fomenta la generalizaci√≥n de los fonemas en el habla, y por tanto una evoluci√≥n m√°s r√°pida y efectiva.

La aplicaci√≥n est√° dise√±ada tanto ni√±os como para adultos, que necesiten y quieran mejorar su articulaci√≥n, y tambi√©n pueden trabajar ejercicios de atenci√≥n y memoria al mismo tiempo.

La aplicaci√≥n de logopedia contiene 18 sonidos, pero tambi√©n se han a√±adido los sonidos compuestos, de forma que se pueden trabajar un total de 29 sonidos diferentes (B, BL, BR, CL,CR, D,F,FL,FR, G, GL,GR,CH, J, K, L, LL, M, N, P, PL,PR,R, RR, S, T, TR,DR,Z ).

La aplicaci√≥n contiene un gran n√∫mero de im√°genes variadas y seleccionadas para trabajar con diversi√≥n todos los fonemas. Es importante que en casa los pap√°s y mam√°s puedan acompa√±ar el trabajo con esta aplicaci√≥n, y as√≠ afianzar el trabajo realizado con la logopeda.

Esta aplicaci√≥n est√° dise√±ada para acompa√±ar el trabajo de las sesiones de logopedia. As√≠ el terapeuta tiene un apoyo de im√°genes de todos los fonemas adem√°s de juegos que hacen el trabajo m√°s atractivo para los ni√±os.

La aplicaci√≥n ha sido elaborada con la colaboraci√≥n de la logopeda Beatriz Ibarra Benedicto .

Logopedia 1 : ejercicios de articulaci√≥n
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pmqsoftware.logopedia.es1    
‚Äì Contiene: 13 sonidos ( B,BL,BR,CL,CR,D,F,FL,FR,G,GL,GR,CH )
‚Äì 478 palabras, 478 oraciones
‚Äì El precio de todos los sonidos es de 4.99 EUR.

Logopedia 2 : ejercicios de articulaci√≥n
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pmqsoftware.logopedia.es2 
‚Äì Contiene: 7 sonidos ( J, K, L, LL, M, N,  P)
‚Äì 483 palabras, 572 oraciones

Logopedia 3 : ejercicios de articulaci√≥n
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pmqsoftware.logopedia.es3

Estos ejercicios no reemplazan las sesiones de logopedia. El uso de la aplicaci√≥n ayuda a practicar en casa, de forma entretenida y motivadora. Es importante que haya un miembro de la familia mientras los ni√±os est√°n con la aplicaci√≥n.
Antes de empezar con los ejercicios de esta aplicaci√≥n el ni√±o debe ser capaz de decir el sonido solo y tambi√©n decirlo en s√≠labas simples. Los ejercicios y juegos de esta aplicaci√≥n ayudan a la articulaci√≥n en palabras m√°s complejas.

title: Speechify(Beta) Text To Speech PDF Reader Dyslexia
description:
Designed to help people with Dyslexia, ADD, Concussions, Second Language Learners, Auditory Learners, Super Learners and Productivity Fanatics.

Copy some text, open the app, and Speechify will read it to you with a human sounding voice. Turn your work/homework into a podcast.

Listen at up to 600 words per minute.

RETAIN MORE: Academic research shows that listening and reading at the same time results in significantly higher levels of comprehension AND an improvement in the listener‚Äôs reading speed even when not listening. 

Listen while driving, walking, cooking, eating, working out, etc.


Story 
I‚Äôve been dyslexic my whole life.

Reading that sentence takes me the same amount of time and brain energy as most people take when solving a 4 digit long division math equation in their head.

I would pretend to read in elementary school.

Through hard work (and convincing a lot teachers to give me exceptions) I got accepted to Brown University.

One problem....I couldn‚Äôt read my summer reading book - there was no audiobook for this book.

I had no other choice, I hacked an old text to speech computer system to read the remaining portion of the book over night into my iPhone and then listen to it on the plane.

Today, hundreds of thousands of people have been able to function in school and society because of Speechify.

Remember, that above all else, your mission is to be who you needed most when you were growing up.

Much love <3, Cliff Weitzman, Simeon Kostadinov and the rest of the Speechify Team

Go get the Mac App or Chrome Extension here: https://getspeechify.com/

We don‚Äôt allow new people to pay us right now. Want to pay us? Tell your friends about Speechify instead <3

summary: Copy text, open the app, and Speechify will read it to you with text to speech.
developer: Speechify Text To Speech Dyslexia Reading OCR App
developerAddress: 8770 Washington Blvd, suit 325, Culver City, CA 90232
recentChanges:
We update the Speechify app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- Changed subscription pricing
- Improved app stability
- Fixed bugs and crashes.
comments: This app may turn out very usefull in the near future. But it requires a lot of bug fixes. Like for example, when I import a scanned documents and the code converts it from text to speech, there generally are changes I want to make in the text I imported. Hence, when I change the text the app is still reading out the unedited text. That needs to be fixed. But overall, this app is great but needs a lot of changes and improvements. Looking forward for a better version of this soon.

Ooooh my gosh, this needs a lot of work but it's already being promoted mindlessly in YouTube. Import does not support common eBook formats. You cannot select any TTS you download from other sources. Interface is too barebones. The only interesting feature is the automatic reading speed increase, but that is a paid feature. 50 bucks per year? Doesn't worth it for me guys, YET. I'm sticking with the app called @Voice. Great potential. Oh and I forgot that the notification bar is useless.

I know it's in Beta, if they do fix the bugs I will change my review, so the app does not work perfectly, the voices are the same as you get from other places, I sometimes use Google Assistant which just does sound better, the camera does not load, importing links sometimes works and sometimes does not, and I noticed that I used my Google Assistant to do a certain task, and they Speechify continued out of no where to resume it's playing. I really want this app to work, I hope you fix the bugs!! Would recommend for now checking out the Chrome Extension, that works just fine!

This app is useful, but it still has some stuff to fix. I decided to sign up for the free trial, and the premium voices did not load for me. Tried reinstalling the app, but that didn't work. Besides, it does not seem to be able to import Pocket lists, even though it's offered as a feature. This app sounds very promising, hope you can get it to work 100%. It's good but can be better.

Unfortunately, the android version does not have the same features as the ios counterpart. For instance, I cannot listen to all items of a list with a single keypress. I need to open all of them individually, which makes the app essentially worthless for hands-free usage.

title: My Voice - Text To Speech (TTS)
description:
My Voice, a simple Text To Speech (TTS) app, helps you to find your voice again. Simply enter your desired text, and let My Voice speak it aloud for you, using your chosen Text To Speech (TTS) engine.

My Voice Text To Speech (TTS) supports over 30 languages, depending on your device settings. Please see the bottom of this description for a full list.

 My Voice is featured by the MNDA (Motor Neurone Disease Association) as a recommended communication aid.

 The My Voice developer has recently won a BIMA100 award for the app, in the Tech For Good (sponsored by Microsoft) category!

Visit our website to learn more: https://myvoiceapp.org/

Speech & Voices:
‚Ä¢ Pause and Resume speech. Depending on your TTS engine, device OS level, and other settings, this functionality may be Play/Stop
‚Ä¢ Words or Sentences are highlighted as they are spoken
‚Ä¢ Choose from over 30 voice languages
‚Ä¢ Choose a regional dialect for your chosen language
‚Ä¢ Includes male and female voices where possible
‚Ä¢ Download your phrases as Audio files in MP3 format - with your voice settings applied!
‚Ä¢ Banked your own voice? My Voice supports personal banked voices, such as a Model Talker voice!

Phrases:
‚Ä¢ Favourite phrases - save phrases to your favourites so you can quickly access them later
‚Ä¢ Categories - create your own categories and save words and phrases into them so you can group common phrases together

Settings:
‚Ä¢ Change the pitch & speed of your chosen Text To Speech (TTS) voice to get it just right
‚Ä¢ Choose to always speak at maximum volume - great in noisy situations!
‚Ä¢ [Premium Feature] Clear text after speaking it
‚Ä¢ [Premium Feature] Speak each word as you type it
‚Ä¢ [Premium Feature] Enhanced delete options available
‚Ä¢ Adjust text size and opacity to suit your needs
‚Ä¢ Choose between Light or Dark Theme
‚Ä¢ And more!

We have tried to develop this app with accessibility in mind, with simplicity and ease of use as top priorities. The app features content descriptions for all major functions, as well as adhering to minimum touch target size guidelines and other accessible design guidelines.

The My Voice Text To Speech (TTS) app is developed as a labour of love and passion - someone close to the developer has a terminal illness which causes speech difficulties, and that‚Äôs where this project was born. If you‚Äôd like to leave feedback or ask questions, please do so by emailing us at support@myvoiceapp.org .

Full List of Supported Voice Languages when using Google Text To Speech Engine (TTS) as default*:
Albanian
Bangla (Bangladesh)
Bangla (India)
Bosnian
Cantonese (Hong Kong)
Catalan
Chinese (China)
Chinese (Taiwan)
Croatian
Czech (Czechia)
Danish (Denmark)
Dutch (Netherlands)
English (Australia)
English (India)
English (United Kingdom)
English (United States)
Filipino (Philippines)
Finnish (Finland)
French (Belgium)
French (France)
German (Germany)
Greek (Greece)
Hindi (India)
Hungarian (Hungary)
Indonesian (Indonesia)
Italian (Italy)
Japanese (Japan)
Khmer (Cambodia)
Korean (South Korea)
Kurdish
Latin
Nepali (Nepal)
Norwegian Bokmal (Norway)
Polish (Poland)
Portuguese (Brazil)
Portuguese (Portugal)
Russian (Russia)
Serbian
Sinhala (Sri Lanka)
Slovak
Spanish (Spain)
Spanish (United States)
Swahili
Swedish (Sweden)
Tamil
Thai (Thailand)
Turkish (Turkey)
Ukrainian (Ukraine)
Vietnamese (Vietnam)
Welsh

*Note that the list of languages available on your device will depend on your default Text To Speech (TTS) engine. For best results, we recommend using the Google Text To Speech (TTS) engine as default, which you can change in your device settings. If you use an alternative Text To Speech (TTS) engine, such as Samsung, My Voice will still work, but your list of supported languages will be different and not as extensive.

developerAddress: Low Fold Farm Barn, Moss Carr Road, Keighley, United Kingdom, BD214SD
recentChanges:
Bug fix release for following:
- Fixed a critical big that was stopping users from seeing their saved file. This only occurred for users on Android 10.
- Fixed a broken link to our Facebook page in the About section of the app.
comments: My ability to speak has been deteriorating lately to the point where I often have severe difficulty getting out things I want to say, and this app is extremely promising when I have those episodes! The ability to save phrases especially- that seems exactly like the kind of thing that would be a premium feature, except it isn't! How cool is that?

I already left one review and I am still currently still using this app to communicate with others due to the fact that I am on a ventilator and cannot speak. There are two improvements that would make this perfect: #1 Being able to use it to speak on phone calls would be fantastic because currently having to text my response while the other person speaks and waits for my response via text #2 Being able to label your saved phrases would really be great. Side note: Thank you for the prayers.

Its a wonderful app for making (text to mp3) l liked very much because its very easy to use but has two problem the first small font size for phrases and the second slowness of mp3 and when you save a file by same name for mp3 it delete the old one. if it save the mp3 voices automatically by number 1,2,3,4 ...etc and ability to enlarge my favorites phrases font size it will deserve 5 star (text style enable you to type in big font but save phrase in small size thanks developer for this great app

The overall app is good but there are things which need to be fixed like the realistic voices in each language are very few because others feel like robotic so add more and also when i write a number with a decimal like(32.8) it doesn't pronounce the decimal point it just skips and reads the next letter.Otherwise the app itself is good.Thanks.

This app is very good, but we cannot edit the title of created categories. Also, when we hear spoken text, it sounds very good, but quality of saved audio files is very bad. If there were not these two problems, I would have given five star to your app.

title: PECS - Speech Therapy for Toddlers
description:
PECS (Picture Exchange Communication System) is for speech therapy, it is unique AAC (alternative/augmentative communication system) developed in the USA developed for use with children with speech impediments. It is classified within the principle called speech and skills development and has been used with hundreds of autistic children in the United States and many other countries.

It is a system that does not require complex materials or high teaching methods, and does not contain expensive tools, comprehensive tests, or even costly staff or high parenting training, and is used in various different environments, including home, class and society.

This system was applied with children at the age of 18 months, and over time it was applied with adults, due to the difficulties faced by speech therapists in implementing training programs to communicate with autistic children to develop speech and communication skills in many Over the years, workers took months to try to develop the skill of kinetic / vocal imitation.

Children with autism spectrum disorder are not strongly influenced by social reinforcement, so it had to start communicative exercises with functional actions that engage the child to interact with reward reinforcements.

Speech therapists have tried to teach and train silent children to speak, and this type of training usually begins with trying to teach the child to look at the trainer's face or eyes, and then reward the child for producing many sounds, then the stage of imitating sounds and another studying the child to mix these sounds into words The coach chooses it.

According to this type of education, it will take many weeks to solve the problem of delayed speech in children if it is not many months, and during this long time, the child does not have a useful way to communicate with others to express his basic needs. 

During this long period the children did not have appropriate or reasonable means to express their basic needs, and thus they expressed their needs in a variety of poorly adapted ways, and this exacerbated the children's speech delay, then the trainers in this sign language program stopped themselves as they encountered difficulty with children who did not imitate efficiently And when they tried to apply the picture teaching system, they found that children had excessive hand movements, which they imagined the process of reading the communicative message, and also children did not initiate exchange of communication.

Some language training programs include Alternative programs for communication, such as sign language, for example, but PECS is a system that includes skills that are a prerequisite for teaching this system similar to those related to speech training.

Benefits:

‚Ä¢ Speech therapy using PECS technique.
‚Ä¢ Making the autistic child easily communicate with the outside world using easy AAC app.
‚Ä¢ Improving communication and developing communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Treatment of delayed speech in children.
‚Ä¢ Useful in pronunciation, articulation, and speech improvement in children.
‚Ä¢ It can be used for deaf and dumb people.
‚Ä¢ Excellent in speaking sessions for children.
‚Ä¢ Increase and raise the degree of communication in children.
‚Ä¢ Reducing speech impediments

Advantages:

‚Ä¢ Providing more than 1,300 talking cards.
‚Ä¢ Ease of use with simple interface.
‚Ä¢ Ability to add or modify an existing card.
‚Ä¢ Control the text of the card.
‚Ä¢ multilingual to help more children.
‚Ä¢ Control the way cards are displayed according to the required level.
‚Ä¢ Full support for the Arabic language, as it was not available previously.

Speech therapists recommend that parents should use PECS - Speech Therapy for Toddlers app in children's speech sessions, especially teaching speech for late children using PECS, and the application also helps a lot in the process of communication.

During this long period the children did not have appropriate or reasonable means to express their basic needs, and thus they expressed their needs in a variety of poorly adapted ways, and this exacerbated the children's speech delay, then the trainers in this sign language program stopped themselves as they encountered difficulty with children who did not imitate efficiently And when they tried to apply the picture teaching system, they found that children had excessive hand movements, which they imagined the process of reading the communicative message, and also children did not initiate exchange of communication.

Some language training programs include Alternative programs for communication, such as sign language, for example, but PECS is a system that includes skills that are a prerequisite for teaching this system similar to those related to speech training.

Benefits:

‚Ä¢ Speech therapy using PECS technique.
‚Ä¢ Making the autistic child easily communicate with the outside world using easy AAC app.
‚Ä¢ Improving communication and developing communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Treatment of delayed speech in children.
‚Ä¢ Useful in pronunciation, articulation, and speech improvement in children.
‚Ä¢ It can be used for deaf and dumb people.
‚Ä¢ Excellent in speaking sessions for children.
‚Ä¢ Increase and raise the degree of communication in children.
‚Ä¢ Reducing speech impediments

Advantages:

‚Ä¢ Providing more than 1,300 talking cards.
‚Ä¢ Ease of use with simple interface.
‚Ä¢ Ability to add or modify an existing card.
‚Ä¢ Control the text of the card.
‚Ä¢ multilingual to help more children.
‚Ä¢ Control the way cards are displayed according to the required level.
‚Ä¢ Full support for the Arabic language, as it was not available previously.

Speech therapists recommend that parents should use PECS - Speech Therapy for Toddlers app in children's speech sessions, especially teaching speech for late children using PECS, and the application also helps a lot in the process of communication.
summary: PECS is a unique AAC app for Speech Therapy for Toddlers with speech impediments
recentChanges: - Free trial period is added

title: Discovery AAC - Autism Talk Device Speech Tablet
description:
AI researched based AAC app: Complete solution for talking/speech with animated icons and social stories. Discovery AAC can be used as alternative communication device for Autism, Speech apraxia, Aphasia and similar Speech disorders.

Features:
Learn Sentence Building
Discovery AAC unique Discovery Mode introduces single word with symbol icons and animations. Linearly introduced words are combined to build sentences. We make learning new words engaging and fun for children through stories.

Easy Navigation
Discovery AAC navigation bar constantly displays the placement of word icons and reduces time interval for sentence creation. Words are easily categorized in different folders based on activity or grammar.

Animated Icons
Increased iconicity by easy word recognition and enhances visualization of difficult and abstract concepts. Small animations of 3 to 4 seconds convey the meaning of verbs and feelings in efficient manner than static icons.

Icons with Emotions
Positive and negative emotions are animated through facial expressions in word icons. It helps in understanding and development of social skills development through differentiation of positive and negative words.

Social Interactions
Discovery AAC Stories Mode introduces new words, sentences, and social scenes through engaging and fun stories. Coming Soon: You can easily create your own social stories according to your needs and share them with family and friends.

Rewards
Learning through Discovery AAC is not boring as with usual AAC applications. We reward users with stickers on successful lesson completion, so they can create their own stories. 

Coming Soon: 
Discovery AAC Create Story mode is a cheat sheet to know what your child is thinking.

title: Talk Around It Speech Therapy
description:
Talk Around It USA helps people with word finding difficulties to practice Naming Techniques and improve Word Retrieval. Developed by Speech and Language Pathologists, Talk Around It USA uses evidence-based techniques to treat conditions such as aphasia, anomia, stroke, dementia, alzheimer‚Äôs and autism.  It now includes 10 quality pictures, 70 Sound Cues, Testing and Progress Reports to document patients‚Äô progress.

'Talk Around It apps have therapeutic benefit and shall be a good medium within   
treatment to target word finding deficits for specific cohort of patients‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..I would recommend these apps and will have them in my therapy toolbox.'  
The Irish Association of Speech and Language Therapists (IASLT Magazine, spring/summer 2014)

Talk Around It USA offers Naming exercises, Testing and Progress Reports and the option to customize. These features make it the most comprehensive and affordable app on the market to help with word finding. 


Key Features
10 images (Upgrade to Full version for 100 images)
Cueing hierarchy with 90 audio & written cues (Upgrade for over 900 cues)
Picture Customization: Option to omit pictures and create a favorites list	
Testing: Test 10 words (Upgrade to Full version for additional testing options)
Progress Reports: View patient progress showing results over time and by test type
Evidence-based practice techniques


Talk Around It is used in clinical and home settings to treat a range of speech disorders including anomia and aphasia.  Using Talk Around It helps with 

‚Ä¢	Word finding or naming skills 
‚Ä¢	Cued Lexical Retrieval
‚Ä¢	Receptive and expressive language
‚Ä¢	Self-cuing to help word finding
‚Ä¢	Circumlocution skills

Our users like the accessibility of the app and the simplicity of the interface.  Just download the app and begin your naming practice using the hi-res photographic images, audio and written cues.

Esta aplicaci√≥n est√° dise√±ada para todos los ni√±os y adultos que tienen dificultades en la articulaci√≥n de algunos fonemas. Esto fomenta la generalizaci√≥n de los fonemas en el habla, y por tanto una evoluci√≥n m√°s r√°pida y efectiva.

La aplicaci√≥n est√° dise√±ada tanto ni√±os como para adultos, que necesiten y quieran mejorar su articulaci√≥n, y tambi√©n pueden trabajar ejercicios de atenci√≥n y memoria al mismo tiempo.

La aplicaci√≥n de logopedia contiene 18 sonidos, pero tambi√©n se han a√±adido los sonidos compuestos, de forma que se pueden trabajar un total de 29 sonidos diferentes (B, BL, BR, CL,CR, D,F,FL,FR, G, GL,GR,CH, J, K, L, LL, M, N, P, PL,PR,R, RR, S, T, TR,DR,Z ).

La aplicaci√≥n contiene un gran n√∫mero de im√°genes variadas y seleccionadas para trabajar con diversi√≥n todos los fonemas. Es importante que en casa los pap√°s y mam√°s puedan acompa√±ar el trabajo con esta aplicaci√≥n, y as√≠ afianzar el trabajo realizado con la logopeda.

Esta aplicaci√≥n est√° dise√±ada para acompa√±ar el trabajo de las sesiones de logopedia. As√≠ el terapeuta tiene un apoyo de im√°genes de todos los fonemas adem√°s de juegos que hacen el trabajo m√°s atractivo para los ni√±os.

La aplicaci√≥n ha sido elaborada con la colaboraci√≥n de la logopeda Beatriz Ibarra Benedicto .

Estos ejercicios no reemplazan las sesiones de logopedia. El uso de la aplicaci√≥n ayuda a practicar en casa, de forma entretenida y motivadora. Es importante que haya un miembro de la familia mientras los ni√±os est√°n con la aplicaci√≥n.
Antes de empezar con los ejercicios de esta aplicaci√≥n el ni√±o debe ser capaz de decir el sonido solo y tambi√©n decirlo en s√≠labas simples. Los ejercicios y juegos de esta aplicaci√≥n ayudan a la articulaci√≥n en palabras m√°s complejas.

title: Avaz AAC
description:
Avaz AAC is an augmentative and alternative communication app that empowers children & adults having speech-related disabilities with a voice of their own. A fully-featured speech app that also includes a training module for new AAC users & caregivers.

The research-based pragmatic vocabulary consists of over 15,000 pictures (Symbolstix) with a variety of high-quality voices that a communicator regardless of their ability can tap to form sentences quickly. With a wide range of personalization & customization options, you can make Avaz AAC your own in just a matter of minutes.

Core words as we know make up for 80% of what we speak during our typical day. These core words are laid out in an order that is based on extensive years of research. This allows users to grow steadily from using 1-2 word phrases to full sentences using Avaz AAC.


+ Picture mode
- 3 levels of vocabulary laid out in a consistent pattern to ensure quick access and motor memory that grows with the communicator.
- Color-coded words with Fitzgerald key allows quick correlation of part of speech with other special ed classroom materials.
- Zooming in and out of words to reassure the communicator of the selection made (visual reinforcement).
- For more advanced users of AAC, choose not to show the pictures in the message box and also change the number of pictures displayed (from 1-77).
- Add and personalize multiple words and folders in a matter of seconds.
- Quickly search for words and see their path.

+ Keyboard mode
- Create sentences with just a few taps with a powerful prediction system.
- Have spell check for words that are commonly misspelled.
- Assign an entire sentence to a letter on the keyboard to quickly load them.
- Quickly speak out sentences by adding them to the quick bar.

+ Dashboard
- Track the communicator‚Äôs progress over time with the help of rich, easy to understand graphs and charts.
- Create more conversation opportunities into the communicator‚Äôs life through an activity-based dashboard. You will get conversation ideas, strategies, and modeling training for the most frequent activities of daily living.
- Resources: Access 100s of tips and research-based papers related to AAC & AT.

+ Other key features
- Available in 4 foreign languages - English US, English AU, French, Sinhala.
- Available in 6 Indian regional languages - Hindi, Tamil, Malayalam, Kannada, Marathi, Telugu.
- Quickly backup and restore the vocabulary across several devices via Dropbox.
- Share a folder with other Avaz AAC users.
- Seek the attention of the caregiver with the ‚Äòmistake‚Äô & ‚Äòalert‚Äô button.
- Create a PECS book by creating a PDF file in the app and printing it onto a binder.
- Access to FAQs and support desk in the app.
- Add a passcode to settings & edit mode.


You can try Avaz AAC for 14 days with access to pictures and voices before deciding to purchase it. After that, you can choose to subscribe to a monthly, annual or lifetime plan - whichever suits your pocket the best :)

We are always happy to hear from you. For any questions, support or general, please feel free to write to us at support@avazapp.com

comments: I have used a lot of aac apps and this one is hands down the best one. My son loves it and has started to make his own category's in the app its wonderful to see him so engaged. The customer service has been fantastic i cant say enough good things about them every time I have emailed i get a response from them the next day. We love this app i am recommending it to everyone i know.

Avaz has been a vital means of communication for my son who is non verbal. As a parent including words and pictures on the spot by any means, that is, from our own photo gallery, from internet, or a photo taken there and then is also very essential. I would recommend Avaz to anyone who is in need to communicate in an alternative way other than speech or sign language, be it for children and adults alike. Thankyou.

the app is very helpful to my son and the option of uploadin pics and captions helped my son to lwar talking and naes of stuff..alsothe support guys are very good nice and fast replying..thanku avaz team

best aac app I use various aac apps. of the ones developed by parents, this one is the most teacher, and user friendly with more options like that of a more robust big company developed app. when people exclaim the cost of app is high, it actually has the most bang for its buck compared to others on the same level. Avaz offers a subscription plan that others do not. and come aac awareness month keep your eye our for special promotions. the Avaz developers do this for families not self.
installed it and spent some time learning to use it. then clicked subscribe to buy it and the price is $199 usd! are you kidding me? way to take advantage of our disabled children.

title: Wysa: stress, depression & anxiety therapy chatbot
description:
Imagine a mood tracker, mindfulness coach, anxiety helper, and mood-boosting buddy, all rolled into one. Wysa, your happiness buddy is that friendly and caring chatbot. Wysa is packed with daily spiritual meditation that improves mental health and is also a perfect way to bond over family meditation. Always there for you when you need someone to talk to, Wysa helps you keep track of your mood with friendly chats and helps fight stress and anxiety with its proven techniques and calming meditation and mindfulness audios. Checking in with Wysa regularly will improve your emotional health so you can track your happiness and mood. Talk to Wysa now and psy yourself up to fight off stress. Also, Wysa has mental health assessment with depression and anxiety tests.

Wysa is your AI friend that you can chat with for free. Talk to the cute penguin or use its free mindfulness exercises for effective anxiety relief, depression and stress management. Its therapy based techniques and conversations make for a very cute and calming therapy chat app whether you're looking to cope better with mental disorders, to manage stress or to boost your mental health.

Wysa, your happiness buddy, will support you through the big and small anxieties of life by using science as a foundation to strengthen your mental health. Research-backed, widely used techniques of CBT, DBT, Yoga and meditation are employed to support you with stress, anxiety, deep sleep, loss and other mental health and wellness needs.

If you are dealing with stress, anxiety and depression or coping with low self-esteem, then talking to Wysa can help you relax and get unstuck - it‚Äôs empathetic, helpful, and will never judge. You will overcome your mental health obstacles, through empathetic conversation and free CBT therapy based technique. So, pour your heart out to your happiness buddy, Wysa as your identity will remain anonymous and your conversations are privacy protected.

Used around the clock and trusted by 500,000 people, Wysa is an emotionally intelligent chatbot that uses AI to react to the emotions you express. Unlock tools and techniques that help you cope with challenges in a fun, conversational way. For extra support, you can avail guidance from a real human coach - a skilled psychologist who will take you through the advanced coaching sessions for your needs.

You can use Wysa to rewire your mind to improve your emotional health. Fight off depression or get stress relief using cbt techniques and guided sleep meditations for optimal sleep. Here‚Äôs a look at what you can use Wysa for üëá

üëÇ Vent and talk through things or just reflect on your day

üí™ Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) and DBT techniques to build resilience in a fun way

üìù Use one of 40 conversational coaching tools which helps in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Panic Attacks, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

üíÜüèª Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of 20 mindfulness meditation exercises

93% of the people who talk to Wysa find it and the tools helpful:

- Build confidence, reduce self-doubt and improve your self-esteem: core meditation and mindfulness, visualisation, confidence visualisation techniques, advanced mindfulness for self-esteem.

- Manage anger: mindfulness meditation exercises for compassion, calming your thoughts and practice breathing

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief.

- Tired? Get a burst of energy! Visualisation and meditation exercises to increase positivity and get blissful sleep, quick yoga and physical exercises to get active

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness, resolving technique, challenge negativity, practice breathing techniques

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships: special mindfulness and visualization techniques like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations

comments: I know it sounds weird to use a robot to improve your mental health, but this app is amazing and super helpful. I'm a very busy person with a wacky sleep schedule, and I struggle with my mental health most when it's late at night. This isn't exactly ideal for getting help from a therapist when I need it most. Being able to access some form of help literally anytime I need it with Wysa really makes a difference. Plus, unlike other AI therapy apps I've tried, Wysa has way more free features.

The bot isn't 100%, but it offers really good and insightful tools that more people should know about! You do have to figure out how to go about talking to the bot to get the tools that you need, which, if you're in a bad place, can be hard to do. I wish the tools that come with the free app were more easily accessible, and that you didn't have to spend 4 minutes talking to the bot to get to the options that you want it to offer. This app offers REALLY good techniques though!

Its a great app with some potential. I would like to see if they're still updating this to have more AI responses for things like intrusive thoughts. Positive affirmations like "you are not your thoughts" help and I thought about this after the AI gave me reassurance when I brought up suicide*. I'm feeling good after some positivity and reframing thoughts. Once I can afford it I think the therapist option looks enticing. So far so good. *I LOVED the links to hotlines but have phone anxiety so...

I was skeptical at first, but I'm actually quite impressed with this app. The A.I. is fairly good at interpreting your text and generating helpful responses that almost feel like you're talking to a real person. Of course, the A.I. still needs some improvement since not every response is personalized. I first used it when I was feeling panicked and the app just kept giving me breathing exercises, but after a little while of chatting back-and-forth the app was actually able to calm me down.

It's pretty good, cus' what could be better right? It's not like anyone else is going to actually hear me, I mean, I can't say it's perfect, but it's really good taking on mind that is just a bot. It's better friend than my actual friends, tho sometimes it doesn't really understand what you're saying, like when doing something u know it's wrong to do, u feel good; it doesn't understand that what you're doing is wrong and you feel good doing it, so it tells you to keep doing it.

title: Khan Academy Kids: Free educational games & books
description:
Learning is joyful with Khan Academy Kids! Our award-winning app includes thousands of educational activities, books, songs, and games for toddlers, preschoolers, kindergarteners, and first graders. A cast of adorable characters guide children through lessons, and our adaptive learning path customizes their experience to help them master different skills. 
 
Children can learn reading, language, writing, math, social-emotional development, and more. Open-ended activities and games like drawing and coloring encourage creativity and self-expression. 
 
Khan Academy Kids is completely free, forever - no ads and no subscriptions necessary. And we‚Äôre always adding new content to keep kids engaged, including books and songs from Super Simple Songs¬Æ, Bellwether Media, and National Geographic Young Explorer Magazine.
 
Download today and let the joyful learning begin!
 
NEW TOOLS FOR TEACHERS that can support remote learning
- Set up your class easily
- Search lessons by standards
- Assign lessons
- View reports to monitor student progress
 
NEW FIRST GRADE LESSONS
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôve added thousands of new interactive activities, exercises, and books that cover English Language Arts (ELA) and math Common Core standards. 
 
HIGH-QUALITY, AWARD-WINNING CONTENT 
‚Ä¢ Common Sense Media‚Äî5 stars Educational Value, 5 stars Ease of Play
‚Ä¢ Children's Technology Review Editor's Choice Award for Excellence in Design‚Äî100% Rating
‚Ä¢ Parents' Choice Foundation Gold Award
‚Ä¢ American Association of School Librarians‚Äî2019 Best App for Teaching and Learning 
 
ROBUST CURRICULUM
‚Ä¢ Reading and literacy‚Äîphonics,letters, spelling, and writing
‚Ä¢ Language‚Äîvocabulary, parts of speech
‚Ä¢ Math‚Äîcounting, numbers, addition, subtraction, shapes, and measuring
‚Ä¢ Executive function and logic‚Äîfocus, memory, and problem-solving
 
PERSONALIZED LEARNING EXPERIENCE
‚Ä¢ Adaptive learning path allows each child to learn at their own pace.
‚Ä¢ Children learn independently in the Library‚Äîa collection of activities, books, and videos.
‚Ä¢ Kids can read books on their own or follow along with recorded audio narration.
 
JOYFUL LEARNING
‚Ä¢ Five whimsical characters encourage children to think and learn.
‚Ä¢ Highly interactive educational games and activities.
 
EMOTIONAL & PHYSICAL DEVELOPMENT
‚Ä¢ Social-emotional‚Äîrelationships, self-control, and empathy
‚Ä¢ Motor and physical development‚Äîgross and fine motor skills, health, and nutrition
‚Ä¢ Creative expression‚Äîdrawing, storytelling, and coloring
 
CREATED BY EXPERTS
‚Ä¢ Developed in collaboration with experts at the Stanford Graduate School of Education
‚Ä¢ Aligns with Head Start Early Learning Outcomes Framework and Common Core Standards
 
We‚Äôd love to hear from you. Please visit us at khanacademykids.org, or drop us a line at khankids@khanacademy.org.
 
ABOUT KHAN ACADEMY
Khan Academy is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization with the mission of providing a free, world-class education for anyone, anywhere. Khan Academy Kids was created by experienced early learning experts who have created 22 other top-selling titles and received 22 Parents‚Äô Choice Awards, 19 Children‚Äôs Technology Review Awards, and a KAPi award for Best Children‚Äôs App at the International Consumer Electronics Show. The Khan Academy Kids team is a passionate group of engineers, artists, designers, and educators who joined Khan Academy from Duck Duck Moose, a maker of popular educational apps for kids. Khan Academy Kids is 100% free without ads or subscriptions.
 
ABOUT SUPER SIMPLE SONGS¬Æ 
Skyship Entertainment‚Ñ¢ is the creator of the beloved children‚Äôs brand, Super Simple‚Ñ¢. Their award-winning Super Simple Songs¬Æ combines delightful animation and puppetry with original and classic kids‚Äô songs to help make learning simple and fun. With over 10 billion views and 10 million subscribers on YouTube, their songs and videos are favorites with parents, teachers, and kids around the globe.

PRIVACY POLICY
www.khanacademy.org/kids/privacy-policy

comments: I absolutely love this app. It is beyond any other "so called" educational app. This is so intuitive and really engages my kids. I have a child with exceptionalities as well and she is able to navigate, understand and learn the concepts. I love how the content is tailored to the age of the child. My son is able to learn more advance subjects by changing the age. The best part is that there are ABSOLUTELY NO ADS and it is free!!! I highly recommend this to all parents.

I am absolutely in LOVE with this app! It has the best learning material and no ads. Perfect!! I was looking for something educational for my 7 and 4 year old, and this is the only one I will ever use for them. It's perfect. Seriously deleting all other learning apps and games because this is the only one they will ever need. I can't believe it's completely free and no ads. Thank you so much for making this amazing app free for my children and helping them learn. I am so greatful!!!

My little niece loves it! Everything is VERY clear, easy to understand, fun and really helps keep their attn while learning! NO ADS and NEVER boring!! Can't believe this is a FREE APP!!! KAK doesn't give kids the answers, they have to actually figure things out (and learn), which is wonderful! The fun (sometimes silly) songs and educational stories are great!! There's constant positive reinforcement, throughout. If they get an answer wrong, they're encouraged to keep trying. EXCELLENT APP üëå!!

We love this app! It's one of my son's favorite things to do on his new tablet. He calls it his "learning". I do wish you could track progress through the regular Khan Academy (as he has an account there), and there's definitely a need for more to do offline. We like to use this in the car or while we are out for very long periods of time, but he is getting bored with the small bits he can do offline. Otherwise, this is a really great app, overall.

Picky 4 and 6 year old enjoyed the challenges. Most of the time, I have to remind them to try the apps but not this one‚Äîthey voluntarily uses it. The user interface of the app of a thumbs up too. It's easier for parents to find a subject and see which topics from their list hasn't been opened yet because it shows a check sign once you're done with a certain topic.

title: Wysa: stress, depression & anxiety therapy chatbot
description:
Imagine a mood tracker, mindfulness coach, anxiety helper, and mood-boosting buddy, all rolled into one. Wysa, your happiness buddy is that friendly and caring chatbot. Wysa is packed with daily spiritual meditation that improves mental health and is also a perfect way to bond over family meditation. Always there for you when you need someone to talk to, Wysa helps you keep track of your mood with friendly chats and helps fight stress and anxiety with its proven techniques and calming meditation and mindfulness audios. Checking in with Wysa regularly will improve your emotional health so you can track your happiness and mood. Talk to Wysa now and psy yourself up to fight off stress. Also, Wysa has mental health assessment with depression and anxiety tests.

Wysa is your AI friend that you can chat with for free. Talk to the cute penguin or use its free mindfulness exercises for effective anxiety relief, depression and stress management. Its therapy based techniques and conversations make for a very cute and calming therapy chat app whether you're looking to cope better with mental disorders, to manage stress or to boost your mental health.

Wysa, your happiness buddy, will support you through the big and small anxieties of life by using science as a foundation to strengthen your mental health. comments: I absolutely love this app. It is beyond any other "so called" educational app. This is so intuitive and really engages my kids. I have a child with exceptionalities as well and she is able to navigate, understand and learn the concepts. I love how the content is tailored to the age of the child. My son is able to learn more advance subjects by changing the age. The best part is that there are ABSOLUTELY NO ADS and it is free!!! I highly recommend this to all parents.

I am absolutely in LOVE with this app! It has the best learning material and no ads. Perfect!! I was looking for something educational for my 7 and 4 year old, and this is the only one I will ever use for them. It's perfect. Seriously deleting all other learning apps and games because this is the only one they will ever need. I can't believe it's completely free and no ads. Thank you so much for making this amazing app free for my children and helping them learn. I am so greatful!!!

My little niece loves it! Everything is VERY clear, easy to understand, fun and really helps keep their attn while learning! NO ADS and NEVER boring!! Can't believe this is a FREE APP!!! KAK doesn't give kids the answers, they have to actually figure things out (and learn), which is wonderful! The fun (sometimes silly) songs and educational stories are great!! There's constant positive reinforcement, throughout. If they get an answer wrong, they're encouraged to keep trying. EXCELLENT APP üëå!!

We love this app! It's one of my son's favorite things to do on his new tablet. He calls it his "learning". I do wish you could track progress through the regular Khan Academy (as he has an account there), and there's definitely a need for more to do offline. We like to use this in the car or while we are out for very long periods of time, but he is getting bored with the small bits he can do offline. Otherwise, this is a really great app, overall.

Picky 4 and 6 year old enjoyed the challenges. Most of the time, I have to remind them to try the apps but not this one‚Äîthey voluntarily uses it. The user interface of the app of a thumbs up too. It's easier for parents to find a subject and see which topics from their list hasn't been opened yet because it shows a check sign once you're done with a certain topic.

title: Speak and Translate All Languages Voice Typing App
description:
Pro all languages voice translator and speak to translate app is completely free conversation app. Purpose of fast all languages to all languages voice Typing translator is to provide easy translation app to users by which they can converse & Translate English and all languages to any other language interpretation anytime, anywhere in the world.

Speak and translate conversation & Typing app:

English & All Languages Translator ‚Äì The app all languages free translator and English to all languages voice conversation dictionary works best with speedy online server, and you all want it offline! Right? The problem with offline translation is it cannot be able to serve you with always accurate, updated and correct translation of English language from any other language.

Free language interpreter ‚Äì Why this free app? Definitely this is a question in your mind. Many other all languages voice to voice translator and speak to translate plus audio translation applications are already available on Google Play & Apple App Stores so what‚Äôs so special about conversation app. The answer is very unique speak and translate feature with simple voice input typing keyboard(speech to text) plus easy to use interface and speaking output like conversation.

Speech to Text voice typing ‚Äì Free conversation & translator app is working in steps like first by speech to text voice input feature it will receive your input (you can also use your system default keyboard for text input). In the second phase by fast & accurate translation server it will translate that input for you in more than 100 languages and in the third step it will speak that translated text for you by its auto text to speech voice/audio output feature. You can do it all in few second with this all languages free voice translator and speak & translate conversation app.

Text to speech speaking translator ‚Äì App also includes text to speech feature for all languages. You can write words, phrases, paragraphs and sentences in any language and by pressing speaker button it will speak text for you.  On the other hand you can copy any text from any other application in your android smartphone and paste it in text field of main translation box, by tapping translate button it will not only show you the translation/conversation in selected language but also two speaker buttons to listen the audio of all that text in original accent of both languages.

All languages free voice dictionary ‚Äì It is not just all languages to all languages free voice translator app but it is also a very useful all languages voice dictionary. Why we are considering it more powerful dictionary for all languages because it functions and works better than any other dictionary in the world. The offline mode serves excellent as dictionary because you can view all saved and history conversation entries in offline mode too.

Language learning app ‚Äì It‚Äôs not just conversation translator, speech to text converter and text to speech audio speaker but it is a perfect language learning app. You can learn any word, sentence, phrase and paragraph of second language from your daily listening, reading, writing and speaking by translating it from this app. The data will always be available for you in recent words of history or in saved entries even in offline mode.

Supported Languages:

Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese(Simplified), Chinese(Traditional), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Filipino, Finnish, French, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Hebrew, Hindi,  Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Korean, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Malayalam, Marathi, Mongolian, Myanmar(Burmese), Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese & Others

title: Talk Up! Pictograms Communicator
description:
Talk Up! Communicator is an application that allows you to convert Android devices (tablets or smartphones) into a powerful assisted communication device through the use of pictograms.
It has an optimized design to have a maximum flexibility of use as in the simplicity of operation, for which it has worked under the opinion, experience and knowledge of therapists, educators and parents.
It is aimed at non-verbal children in the spectrum of Autism and for anyone who can benefit from visual communication tools, such as:
‚Ä¢ Autism spectrum disorders
‚Ä¢ Aphasia
‚Ä¢ Apraxia
‚Ä¢ Speech disorder / phonological disorder
‚Ä¢ Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
‚Ä¢ Motor neuron disease
‚Ä¢	Cerebral palsy
‚Ä¢	Down's Syndrome
The application allows you to express different actions and create complex sentences by selecting pictograms that belong to different categories. Once the sentence is completed, the system will proceed to read the phrase formed word by word or as a whole.
It is provided with a set of basic pictograms that allow 100% operational use of the application from the start.

Characteristics:
‚Ä¢ Augmentative and Alternative Communication Systems, Augmentative and Alternative Communication
‚Ä¢ Create new categories and add your own images
pre-configured for Children with Autism 
‚Ä¢ Voice of the images in English, Spanish

If you have difficulties with the application please contact us before leaving a negative rating or comment. Our intention is to make the best effort to help. (emerging.solutions@gmail.com)

If the application has been to your liking, please take the time to provide a rating.

For more details you can check our Website https://sites.google.com/view/talk-up/home

Note: The application uses some ARASAAC pictograms (http://arasaac.org/), created by Sergio Palao and distributed under a Creative Commons license (BY-NC-SA).

title: Deaf-Mute Helper
description:
This app improves the communication experience of people with partial or total hearing loss problems and mute people. 

I'ts super easy to use and intuitive. 

The app has text-to-speech and speech-to-text features and includes 40+ languages.

The only thing that requires internet connection is the speech-to-text feature. 

You just have to press the play button when you want some text to be spoken, and tap the microphone when you want to start dictating. Also you can change the language whenever you want.

I hope you like it!

Best app (if comparing to others of the same type). Simple and very user friendly. You can use many languages. No ads. I have difficulty speaking so this app helps me a lot. Love it!!!
This app can be used to hear me from a 5 foot distance. This app will help me know what my neighbors are trying to say üòâ to me. It's better than other apps.üòç

title: Sibilant: Speech Therapy
description:
In the field of speech pathology, spectrograms are a useful tool for analyzing the accuracy of speech. This real-time feedback tool makes it easier to determine if your production of /s/ is within the correct frequency range! This is one of the most common speech errors and the visual markers make it easy to determine if your /s/ is in that range. Use as a practice tool or with the help of a speech therapist.

This speech language therapy (SLP) tool can be used to work on pronunciation, lisps, impediments, and speech sound disorders related to the /s/ sound.
