title: Learn Languages with Music
description:
It's very easy and fun! All you have to do is play a song of your choice and listen closely to fill of the missing words in the song lyrics, by selecting the correct option.

With LyricsTraining, you will not only quickly improve your listening comprehension, but also expand your vocabulary by learning new words and expressions, improving your reading comprehension and boosting your grammar skills.

Forget about studying and memorizing endless vocabulary lists for a moment. Learn effortlessly and let your brain do the rest of the work. Just play and have fun while you practice.

‚ÄúLearning is most successful when students are relaxed, confident and enjoying their learning‚Äù
‚Äî John Truscott

‚ÄúLanguage acquisition does not require extensive use of conscious grammatical rules, and does not require tedious drill‚Äù
‚Äî Stephen Krashen

Thousands of teachers around the world already use LyricsTraining and recommend it to their students.

LyricsTraining really works!

MUSIC AND LANGUAGE LEARNING
Music stimulates learning and memorization naturally. It is just like when we were kids!

Listening to different accents and intonations helps our brain become more flexible and adaptable so that it can recognize different sounds of a new language.

You will not be able to keep yourself from singing along while you listen to the songs and follow the lyrics, which will also improve your pronunciation.

Apart from musical content, there is other content that may interest you, such as movie clips, TV shows, talks, etc. Check out our list of genres.

MAJOR FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Multiple choice and karaoke mode. Select the difficulty that best suits your level or simply enjoy synchronized video and lyrics in karaoke mode.
‚Ä¢ Bilingual dictionary and integrated translation. Press and hold any word or expression to learn its meaning or translate it into your language. (Not available for romanized languages)
‚Ä¢ Level up. Play every day to level up, complete new lyrics and earn new achievements.
‚Ä¢ Expand your vocabulary. The more you play, the more words you will get and the greater your language proficiency becomes.
‚Ä¢ Compete against other users. Try to get the best score by competing with users from your country or the rest of the world.
‚Ä¢ Challenge your friends. Create and share friends-only challenges.
‚Ä¢ Track your progress. Check your activity history to track your progress.

OVER TEN LANGUAGES
Learn English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Japanese (Romanji), Turkish, Polish, Swedish, Finnish, or Catalan.

More languages on the way.

PREMIUM FEATURES
Play three games a day for free, or switch to premium to play without limits and unlock some important features:

‚òÖ Play thousands of lyrics without waiting.
‚òÖ Translate any word or phrase without limits.
‚òÖ Access your vocabulary and your complete activity history.

COMMUNITY OF USERS
Join a great community of over 2 million users.

If you cannot find a song, write to support@lyricstraining.com, or collaborate with us by adding your favorite songs through our website: https://lyricstraining.com

What are you waiting for? Start learning by playing!

title: Aphasia Talk Around It Nature
description:
Talk Around It Nature

Overview

Talk Around It helps people with word finding difficulties to practise Naming Techniques and improve Word Retrieval. Developed by Speech and Language Therapists, Talk Around It uses evidence-based techniques to treat conditions such as aphasia, anomia, stroke, dementia, alzheimer‚Äôs and autism. It now includes over 100 high quality pictures, over 900 Cues, Testing and Progress Reports to document patients‚Äô progress.
 

Talk Around It now offers Naming exercises, Testing and Progress Reports and the option to customise. These features make it the most comprehensive and affordable app on the market to help with word finding. 

**Try the FREE version to see how the features can help you**

 
New updates include:
‚Ä¢	Picture Customisation: Option to omit pictures and create a favourites list	
‚Ä¢	Testing: Test 10 words, 50 words or your Favourite Words
‚Ä¢	Progress Reports: View patient progress showing results over time and by test type
‚Ä¢	Enhanced audio

Key Features
‚Ä¢	Over 100 quality images 
‚Ä¢	Over 900 cues (audio and written)
‚Ä¢	Semantic questions for circumlocution
‚Ä¢	Evidence-based practice techniques
‚Ä¢	Option to hide timer in test mode
‚Ä¢	Easy to use interface
‚Ä¢	No ads or in-app purchases

Talk Around It is used in clinical and home settings to treat a range of speech disorders including as anomia and aphasia.  

Using Talk Around It helps with 

‚Ä¢	Word finding or naming skills 
‚Ä¢	Cued Lexical Retrieval
‚Ä¢	Receptive and expressive language
‚Ä¢	Self-cuing to help word finding
‚Ä¢	Circumlocution skills

Our users like the accessibility of the app and the simplicity of the interface.  Just download the app and begin your naming practice using the hi-res photographic images, audio and written cues.

title: Text to Speech Converter
description:
Simple Application to convert written text to speech very Easily and Efficiently.

                                                        Text to Speech Converter
We introduce to you the app 'Text to Speech Converter'. This app, as mentioned in it's name converts text to speech. With this app and the phenomenal features that have been embedded in it, you can now listen to a number of articles, web page, documents etc. This indeed is designed for all those out there who struggle to read from a screen.
'Text to Speech Converter' : Reading tiny fonts from your electronic gadget whether it be a phone, tablet, laptop or computer all the time can sometimes turn out to be very tiring as well as it strains your eyes. Which is one of the main reason for the publishment of this app: it lets you sit back, relax and let the app do your reading for you. 
'Text to Speech Converter' will also assist you in improving the language that you wish to speak. It is recommended for all age groups, especially those with learning disorders. The app ensures to make every student's life manageable and accommodate for.
'Text to Speech Converter' provides you with a number of realisticly sounding voices in a range of languages spoken all over the globe. Some of these include English, French, German, Mandarin,  Japanese and Korean. It has the ability to control the speed of the speech (from slow to fast or vise versa), text size, change to the speaker of your choice and background colour to suit your preferances.
'Text to Speech Converter' supports PDF, HTML FILES, all Word documents, eBooks as well as PowerPoint. 'Text to Speech Converter' not only provides you with a system of import text such as access to your documents in your Android's micro-SD card but also access to OneDrive, Google Drive as well as Dropbox.This app is guarenteed to help you.
'Text to Speech Converter', a guarenteed app that you can trust!

Simple Application to convert written text to speech very Easily and Efficiently.

-->  Text to speech converter applications, as if user write any text and wants to speak out, then they should use this application.
--> If you want to get written text by speaking, then you must use speech to text converter functionality.

--> Users can write and convert text to speech and speech to text in English, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean and Taiwan  languages.

With this app and the phenomenal features that have been embedded in it, you can now listen to a number of articles, web page, documents etc. This indeed is designed for all those out there who struggle to read from a screen.
'Text to Speech Converter' : Reading tiny fonts from your electronic gadget whether it be a phone, tablet, laptop or computer all the time can sometimes turn out to be very tiring as well as it strains your eyes. Which is one of the main reason for the publishment of this app: it lets you sit back, relax and let the app do your reading for you.
'Text to Speech Converter' will also assist you in improving the language that you wish to speak. It is recommended for all age groups, especially those with learning disorders. The app ensures to make every student's life manageable and accommodate for.
'Text to Speech Converter' provides you with a number of realisticly sounding voices in a range of languages spoken all over the globe. Some of these include English, French, German, Mandarin, Japanese and Korean. It has the ability to control the speed of the speech (from slow to fast or vise versa), text size, change to the speaker of your choice and background colour to suit your preferances.
'Text to Speech Converter' supports PDF, HTML FILES, all Word documents, eBooks as well as PowerPoint. 'Text to Speech Converter' not only provides you with a system of import text such as access to your documents in your Android's micro-SD card but also access to OneDrive, Google Drive as well as Dropbox.This app is guarenteed to help you.
'Text to Speech Converter', a guarenteed app that you can trust!

title: Predictable - Text based communication app
description:
Predictable, a multi-award winning Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) text-to-speech app.
 
 
Designed for people who cannot speak because of conditions such as:
- ALS / MND
- Autism
- Cerebral Palsy
- Down‚Äôs syndrome
- Learning difficulties
- Stroke / Aphasia
- Laryngectomy
- Apraxia
 
 
Using the latest word prediction technology, the app makes speaking out a text-based message easy.
The software learns from your patterns of use and thereby predicts what you will type next in your message easily and accurately. Predictable makes typing (in both American and British English) accurate and speedy!
 

Categories, in Predictable, make it possible to save your frequently used phrases or sentences and easily retrieve them when you want to speak them. 
 
 
No WiFi needed to use most the app (only needed to backup your account data)
 

Main features:
 
Speech 
Compatible with the device voices, ModelTalker, Ivona and Acapela voices
Change the rate and pitch of the voices
  
Accessibility
Switch Access: accessible via Bluetooth switch box + switch/es 
Configurable settings for auto or user scan
Touch Anywhere: use the whole screen as a switch with scanning
  
Emojis
Predictable 6 offers a large selection of customisable emojis.
Attach recordings to your emojis 
  
Phrase bank
Link your phrases in categories to YouTube videos, or website URLs
  
Web platform
Manage your phrase bank content from the web platform
The phrase bank content is now compatible with myMessageBanking.com format
Access online training to earn Predictable certificates
  
Appearance
Different keyboard options to choose from (10 Key, QWERTY, ABCD, High Frequency, Apple and any other Bluetooth or downloadable keyboard).
Use the notepad for on-screen handwriting that works with the word prediction
Customise your Predictable appearance by changing font, colours and other settings
High Contrast option
Ability to increase the size of the word prediction text
  
Customer Support
User guides available on your app, on Therapy Box website and upon request
Send a support request directly from your app
Call us up with any queries or problems
Short tutorial videos available from the app
Join Therapy Box Facebook community to get help from other users
  
 
You can find more information about Predictable at http://therapy-box.co.uk/predictable

I have voice loss issues and have tried other aac apps, which have been okay but slow because of no predictive text. This app is perfect for a literary individual if you don't want to use aac apps that are more picture based. The interface of this is relatively simple too, without having to go through multiple layers of menus and screens like some which again makes it faster to use. Both the predictive text and the appearance is very customisable which makes it a great experience to engage with
When this app updated it locked me out and doesn't recognize my email! I haven't been able to use it for a week and now it won't even open!

I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has communication difficulties. When I speak to new people they understand me straight away, shopkeepers are very helpful and go out of their way to be understanding.

I am unable to speak due to MND and I have been using predictable for the 
past year and half. I use predictable as my voice and my family have got 
really used to it. I use the whole time and have never had any problems.

title: Pictosonidos
description:
Pictosonidos es una aplicaci√≥n donde a trav√©s de los pictogramas, con sonidos y locuciones asociadas, se ayuda a la comprensi√≥n de conceptos y a incrementar el vocabulario de personas con trastornos de comunicaci√≥n oral, que aprenden m√°s f√°cilmente a trav√©s de im√°genes.

A trav√©s de los pictogramas ayudamos a las personas a situarse en espacio y tiempo, a anticiparse a acontecimientos, a expresar sus inquietudes y sentimientos, a comunicarse de una manera alternativa de forma general.

El funcionamiento de la web de Pictosonidos es muy sencillo,  los pictogramas est√°n agrupados en diferentes categor√≠as; al acceder a cada categor√≠a pueden ir avanzando progresivamente uno a uno, o bien avanzar al pictograma que se quiera mediante el panel superior de acceso r√°pido a los pictogramas de cada categor√≠a.

Cada pictograma lleva asociada una locuci√≥n de la palabra y en aquellos casos que disponga de sonido esa unidad, dicho sonido sonar√° previo a la locuci√≥n, para facilitar en lo posible la comprensi√≥n de dicha imagen.

Cada palabra de cada categor√≠a lleva asociada una frase con locuci√≥n de voz incluida, para una mejor asimilaci√≥n de conceptos, a la cual se accede pulsando en el icono de conversaci√≥n de la esquina del pictograma central, el cual nos abrir√° una pantalla flotante con la frase complementaria al concepto.

Hemos procurado hacer la navegaci√≥n de la aplicaci√≥n lo m√°s intuitiva posible y alcanzar con ello un mayor grado de usabilidad a la hora de manejar tantos conceptos.

Incluimos juegos en aquellos apartados que contienen sonidos para hacer del aprendizaje una experiencia m√°s amena, una vez adquiridos los conocimientos de vocabulario necesarios a trav√©s de dichos pictogramas, sonidos y locuciones.

Existe la posibilidad de descarga de la aplicaci√≥n para que pueda ser usada por cada usuario sin la necesidad de disponer de internet para su uso, en la actualidad est√° solo disponible para Android esperamos que en breve tambi√©n lo est√© para iOS.

title: Speak N Calculate (Voice & Talking Calculator)
description:
Speak N Calculate is a simple yet powerful scientific calculator. It allows you to calculate either by your voice inputs or simply by typing like normal calculator. Calculator is a basic need for those who are students of Engineering, Science etc or for clerical work and for other purposes like carpentry, shops, markets etc.This app is designed to give more accurate results by keeping in mind the various pronunciations for a operator. For all calculator users, Speak N Calculate is a free and best tool to solve your mathematical problems.

Speak N Calculate will automatically calculate what you say. Now you don't need to waste your in typing or touching the keypad. You just need to speak to the calculator and it will sort out your mathematical problem. Another interesting feature of Speak N Calculate is that it will pronounce the answer you have calculated.

Features of Speak N Calculate:
‚úìSimple and easy to use.
‚úìCalculates what you speak.
‚úìAllows you to work with ''Speak Mode'' and ''Normal Mode".
‚úìMulti-Pronunciations for a single operator.
‚úìBuilt-in Text-to-Speech feature will pronounce the answer you have recorded earlier.
‚úìIt has the power to solve not only the simple problems but also the trigonometric problems.
‚úìYou can use it to perform complex calculations simply by speaking.

How to Use:
Step 1: From the Menu Screen, choose the ''Speak Mode''.
Step 2: Now click on the ''Speak Button'' to record your mathematical problem. After you are done with speaking, Speak N Calculate will automatically display and speak the answer of your problem you have recorded earlier.

Important Instructions:
Before you use the App, keep these points in your mind:
1. To use functions other than simple operators(+, -, x, /), make sure that you are connected to internet.
2.	Operator/Functions		To pronounce for App
		+						Plus
		-						Minus
		x						Multiply by, into
		√∑						Divided by
		‚àö						Square root, Square root of, 
								Under root, Under root of, Root
		^						Raised to the power, Raise 
								power, Power, Exponent
		%						Percentage
		log						Log of, Log
		e						Antilog of, Antilog
		Answer					Answer
		sin()						sin, sin of
		cos()						cos, cos of
		tan()						tan of*
		sin-1()					Sin inverse, Sin inverse of, 
								Inverse of sin
		cos-1()					Cos inverse, Cos inverse of, 
								Inverse of cos
		tan-1()					tan inverse, tan inverse of,
								Inverse of tan
* To use the Tan() function please speak like ''tan of'' to avoid the app mixing with "10" and ''tan''.

This App is designed to give users better ease to solve their mathematical problems. If you find any mistake or having any issue while using the App, feel free to contact the developer.
For contact: bew.feedback@gmail.com

Just give it a try! Hope it will really helps you.

comments: I've tried many OCR apps (image to text converter) and none of them came close to what this app produces. Although it is still not perfect yet (which is mainly because of infinite handwriting styles), at least it doesn't produce gibberish like the other apps. I hope the algorithm keeps improving and it would be great if you could add speech for other language texts too.

Have been looking for an app to transcribe my handwritten notes to editable text for a while. Just downloaded this app after reading a positive review. The said OCR is by no means perfect, but then neither is my handwriting and so far I am actually pretty impressed. I like to save an image of the page to OneNote and then copy the transcribed text next to it. Would be great if I could setup a macro to do both in one go.

On my galaxy s9 I am using this app in tandem with quizlet (split screen view) to create a study guide. I'm surprised I couldn't find this option on google keyboard, but this is a fine alternative. Ads are annoying but never that bad, and the very empirical way the text is transcribed is much appreciated. 5 stars for functionality, overall 4.7 because ads

Top of the line, excellent for small receipts and business cards. Good for books but you might need two or three takes per page. I couldn't test it properly for handwriting during the very limited trial time allowed. Overall the development of this APP is marvelous, excellent work!

This app has been a very useful tool. I'm so grateful for the intelligence put into making it. God bless you guys. Edit. Now you can't use this app without subscription. It gives you a trial period, after which, you have to subscribe to use it. It's been good while it lasted. Goodbye, I'm uninstalling now.

title: Sleep Disorders And Problems
description:
Sleeping Disorders: The History 
‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ
When we hear about sleeping disorders we're commonly hearing about those who sleepwalk and can't sleep which is known as insomnia, but often we wonder why sleeping disorders are becoming a prominent issue in today's society. Right now according to the website Wikipedia there are a total of 14 different disorders ranging from eye twitching to restless legs. Some of these problems are treatable and even preventable when monitored by a doctor or specialized health professional. Sleeping disorders can be extremely dangerous when they go undiagnosed. Many people who are suffering from this disorder are facing a lot of life threatening problems because having a sleeping disorder can disrupt you from living your normal everyday life.

This can overtake someone if they're spending more time worrying about their condition than getting the correct amount of sleep. The problem with many people who are dealing with a sleeping disorder is that they're not aware of it being a problem until they see it's affecting their job and everyday life. Those who suffer from this can also develop clinical depression because they feel like they're not able to do any of the things they're used to doing if they've been diagnosed with a sleep disorder.

Individuals are given a test called the Polysomnogram which is used to determine and diagnose sleep disorders so specialists and doctors can plan a treatment designed for that individual person since not all treatments are the same. According to Wikipedia they list the common treatment options for sleeping disorders are: behavioral/psychotherapeutic, medications (Rozerem, Ambien, Ambien CR and Lunesta are common prescribed sleeping pills given for those diagnosed with a sleeping disorder), and other somatic treatments that are given. Sometimes people who have disorders such as narcolepsy usually have their brain activity measured to see where they are reaching peak points of sleeping so they can be treated since narcoleptics can't really work on jobs that require them to operate machinery or other things because they have to be alert and awake to know what they're doing.


In this audiobook you read about these topics:
‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ
01 - A Sleep Disorder That Affects the Legs - Restless Sleep Syndrome

02 - An Alternative Approach for Overcoming a Sleep Disorder

03 - Children With the Sleep Disorder of Sleepwalking

04 - Fatal Familial Insomnia

05 - How to Tell If You Have a Sleep Disorder

06 - Hypersomnia (oversleeping)

07 - Illnesses That Can Cause a Sleep Disorder

08 - Insomnia - The Most Prevalent Form of Sleep Disorder

09 - Insomnia in popular culture

10 - Insomnia

and much more!


Contact us! ‚ô°
‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ
For latest updates, please like us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/Twayesh.Projects

And also follow us on Twitter
https://twitter.com/TwayeshProjects

Or you could just email us at our E-mail
info@twayesh.com


DISCLAIMER:
‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ
This audiobook is in English. 
This audiobook require android tts - text to speech.

The text-to-speech (TTS) technology may not be available in some devices. To check if your phone is able of speech synthesis: Menu -> Settings -> Voice input & output -> Text-to-speech settings.
If not installed, your device may ask you to install the TTS engine. An internet connection may be required.

‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ‚úπ

title: Note Text Player (Read aloud)
description:
Note Player is a note taking app with special features, like an integrated text player that can read aloud, a tablet layout with preview of the text of the selected note and the ability to retrieve texts from other apps or websites.
   
Features
‚Ä¢ Write and save your notes and give them a colored label to organize your notes.
‚Ä¢ Integrated Text to Speech (TTS) player with play, pause, backward and forward buttons and with highlighting of the spoken sentence.
‚Ä¢ Beam a note to another device with NFC.
‚Ä¢ Share text from any website directly to Notes Player and save it for later reading.
‚Ä¢ Phone layout and Tablet layout with preview of the text of the note.
‚Ä¢ Light and dark theme.
‚Ä¢ Import text files created on your laptop.
‚Ä¢ Backup and restore function and daily Auto-backup.
‚Ä¢ Choose from fonts like Roboto, Monospace and Open sans.
‚Ä¢ Option to hide or show the play-buttons.
‚Ä¢ Several sorting options.
   
Retrieve text from websites or other apps
If you find interesting articles or texts in others apps or on a website in your browser, it can be very convenient to save the information in one central app, so you can read or have the text read aloud at a later time.
If you want to save an article, you can go to the share function of the browser or the other app and share to Note Player. You can then choose to share the link or the text of the website. The text will be retrieved from the shared link.
   
Useful for people who are speech-impaired
The app can also be and useful AAC tool for people who are speech-impaired for communicating longer texts with more control over the spoken text with the play-buttons. 
For instance if you want to give a public speaking. It can also be a tool to practice during rehabilitation, for instance to practice with your favorite text after a stroke. It's helpful that the text is spoken with the spoken sentence highlighted as well.
   
Speech language and voice
The voice is not part of the app, but the app uses the voice that‚Äôs installed on your device. For instance the voices from Google Text-to-Speech TTS. You can change the voice in the settings of your device. You can also download other voices or speech languages from the Google Play Store from companies like SVOX or Acapela.
   
Upgrade to full version
With the lite version of this app you can save up to 20 notes. In the settings of the app, you can upgrade to remove the limit.
   
Feedback and information
For feedback, questions, tips or problems, please contact: android@asoft.nl

I have been using this app for several years now and recommend it to others. I love it

title: Sleep Cycle: Sleep analysis & Smart alarm clock
description:
Relax, sleep better and wake up feeling rested with Sleep Cycle, the smart alarm clock. Track sleep from bedtime to morning, and get detailed analysis with the app that makes waking up in the morning just that bit easier. 

Track sleep using your phone and start your day feeling energized with our intelligent alarm clock and sleep tracker. Its unique design only wakes you up while you‚Äôre in your light sleep phase. Plus, you‚Äôll get detailed reports as Sleep Cycle monitors your sleep patterns, from bedtime until you're waking up. Track sleep and use the data to help you sleep better today! 

‚è∞ Waking up made easy - 5 reasons you‚Äôll love Sleep Cycle:

1. Sleep better with a gentle wake up call - Sleep Cycle‚Äôs alarm clock wakes you up while you‚Äôre in light sleep and is a natural way to start your day.
2. Relax at bedtime and track sleep easily - Learn about your sleep patterns with detailed analysis. 
3. A sleep tracker with a difference - There‚Äôs no phone under your pillow, you can track sleep by placing your device on the nightstand or close by on the floor. 
4. Your health comes first - Your sleep data and reports will help you feel great inside and out. 
5. Sleep better - Relax and let Sleep Cycle analyse your light sleep, deep sleep and overall health.

Relax with a good night‚Äôs sleep that will do wonders for your health. 

Download Sleep Cycle today - waking up in the morning has never been easier! 

Free features

‚àö Sleep analysis with Sleep Cycle patented sound technology, or accelerometer
‚àö Detailed sleep statistics and daily sleep graphs
‚àö Carefully selected alarm melodies
‚àö Snooze by shaking or double tapping the phone lightly
‚àö Customizable wake-up window. From instant (regular alarm clock), up to 90 minutes

Premium features

‚àö Longterm sleep tracker trends
‚àö Compare your sleep data to world sleep statistics ‚Ä¢ Snore trends - view historical snore trends data
‚àö Sleep aid - helps you fall asleep easier
‚àö Sleep notes - see how events such as drinking coffee, stress, working out, or eating late affect your sleep quality
‚àö Wake up mood - see how Sleep Cycle affects your wake up mood
‚àö Online backup - lets you secure your sleep data online
‚àö Export sleep data to Excel for detailed analysis


REQUIREMENTS
Ability to charge your phone by the bed.
Ability to place your phone near the bed, such as on a nightstand table or on the floor.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I love the sleep tracker feature on this! I upgraded just to accurately record my sleep and it has improved over time. One feature I wish it could do in the tracker is combine different sleep sessions in same day. For example, I like to take a 30min nap during lunch break. Sometimes at night, I am woken up to take dog out, or use the facilities. When I stop and restart it, it only records the most recent session.

Doesn't always record analysis. Some mornings you turn the alarm off (the alarm that is part of this app) and it simply does nothing instead of displaying your sleep record. It seems random as to when it works. In particular when you turn the alarm off and it goes to snooze (another glitch) it fails to record.

I benefited from this app a few years ago and need to do this again. Why did it switch from accelerometer to microphone? How will it know if I've stopped breathing or just changed sides? The accelerometer was way cool.

The microphone tracking is a great idea and seems well implemented, but there are two issues that baffle me that are easily fixed: 1) I often wake up early and want to know if I've gotten enough sleep. Show me. Why make me remember what time I went to bed and calculate? 2) It knows when I'm awake or asleep based on the microphone data so why doesn't it subtract out the time I was not sleeping? "In bed" time should be a second, less-important metric. Time actually asleep is more important.

It works. Its got a well designed UX. It really helps people with disorders such as ADHD where following a regular routine is important, but regular alarms are too discordant. I like the fact that the upgrade screen is at the beginning. The design is Honest. So all in all, well done.

comments: The app is one of the best apps out there but the update has not been great at all. It does not give you an option of the voice you really prefer to listen to. At the moment, it forces you listen to different unwanted voices by selecting one section. Please list the voices namely for selections if you can. For example; Brian's voice, Adam's voice, Elizabeth's voice, etc., with individually distinctive voices to be selected from.

After the update, the text-to-speech function has been over the place. Took long pauses in between sentences. Inconsistent voice between sentences. Chages pitch and sometimes voice all the the. I have been using the app for so long and this was the worst update yet. I will change it after a fix. P. S. I'm using the Google TTS

I subscribed to the wavenet text to speech but I've not been able to use it. Clicking on the play button doesn't start it. I can't load any of the voice settings either. It goes into a loop and keeps loading forever. None of the text to speech functionalities work on my device.

The updated version is somewhat better, but it still shuts off randomly. The app keeps trying to force you into a 2.99 a month deal. Wth??? Are you making the app worse so we have to purchase this addition??? Still needs improvement. The updated version in text to speech DOESN'T pronounce ANY f's in the words. Poor update needs corrected asap.

The text to speech button disappeared with the most recent update. This is sad. Used to be one of my favorite apps. Still seems to work for epubs but tts is gone for pdf. 1. Text is still copyable. 2. It was working with pdfs until the update yesterday. As i said i use the app everyday and the ability to use tts on pdf disappeared yesterday after the update. I was in ths middle of listening to a book when the update happened

title: aCommunicate for the disabled
description:
TESTED BY MORE THAN 1000 PATIENTS WITH DISABILITIES AND CONSIDERED INDISPENSABLE aCommunicate is a communication programme with a voice synthesiser output. It is designed for people who have difficulty speaking and is ideal for people with: difficulties with verbal expression or total inability with language motor disabilities spastic tetraparesis epileptic seizures neurological pathologies patients with ALS genetic mutations aphasia vocal cord problems mutism dysnomia Parkinson's disease epilepsy anxiety

You can create phrases and personal tables for communication, which can also be composed by the speech therapist, which means you will be able to go beyond the pre-loaded phrases to make use of your own personal phrases. Transform your tablet or smartphone into a communication aid, assisting and encouraging the patient in communication, enhancing cognitive processes and symbol recognition. Also, it is often useful when a surgical operation creates a temporary loss of verbal linguistic ability. It is also an excellent aid when it is necessary to repeat yourself and communicate to children

It could be prescribable by the health service as communication software, given that it is probably covered by ISO 21.42.06.006 as a symbolic communicator with 100 boxes (ask the prescribing doctor, or the ASL prosthesis office of your own region). You will need an invalidity certificate with a statement of the pathology involved. The application uses the voice that is installed in the device. For example the voices from Google Voice Synthesis. It is possible to change the voice in the settings of your device.

The app has been translated into various languages, including: English French Russian German

title: Learn English - Listening and Speaking
description:
LET‚ÄôS START LEARNING TO SPEAK ENGLISH LIKE A NATIVE SPEAKER! 

"Learn English - Listening And Speaking" is one of PORO‚Äôs ongoing apps for self-learners who want to speak English easily and effectively. With 750 daily dialogues, a list of lessons with various topics from greeting, introduction, shopping, business conversations, family talks, etc‚Ä¶. It's suitable for all English learners from beginner to intermediate and advanced level to practice speaking English.

While listening to the conversation of the native speaker, try to imitate full sentences with the same intonation, pronunciation like the native speaker. By PORO's app, you can not only learn the accent, pronunciation, stress and intonation of native speakers and improve listening skill but also learn groups of vocabularies and useful phrases to communicate in daily talking.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Main features of PORO's App:
 
‚òÖ Common conversations.
- More than 750 lessons about common English conversation in daily life with audio files of native speakers.
- Various topics from greeting, introduction, small talk to business conversations‚Ä¶ 
- Consist of the audio script for learner to follow. 

‚òÖ Show/ Hide transcript, translation.
- Understand and remember the native speaker's reading way by customizing the show/ hide transcript mode.
- Understand the meaning of new vocabulary and the meaning of the full sentence in each situation by customizing the translation mode

‚òÖ Sentences are highlighted following the audio. 
- The mode that sentences are highlighted following the audio will help you to follow the conversation directly. 
- You can click on the sentence to listen/ practice that phrase again

‚òÖ Playlist mode.
Enjoy practicing English while driving or traveling‚Ä¶, you just need to turn on the app and click on playlist mode. 

‚òÖ Practice game.
By playing completing sentences game, you would know if you have already remembered the full sentence and its structure or not.

‚òÖ Learn English through news.
Not only can you improve your listening skill and vocabulary but also can enrich your knowledge and update world news.

‚òÖ Learn English through stories.
Learning English becomes more interesting because PORO has added a new function called Learning English through stories. You can enlarge your vocabulary, and learn how to express yourself in particular situations!

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ The App ‚ÄúLearn English - Listening And Speaking" is suitable for:

‚òÖ False-beginners and who want to improve English communication.
‚òÖ Those who self-study English at home.
‚òÖ Learners who want to practice for TOEIC, IELTS tests. 
‚òÖ Those who love communicating in English and practicing English by shadowing method.
‚òÖ Those who like to challenge your level. 

‚ÄúLearn English - Listening And Speaking‚Äù App is still in the developing process, so we hope to receive your contributed comment to make it better. We are a team that loves the English language and always try to share our love with the community, so if you like this app then please take a moment to rate 5 stars for it! You can also contact us by commenting or clicking the feedback button on the options screen. 

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Please kindly contact: 
- Email: support@porostudio.com 

Thank you very much and good luck to you!

title: Learn Vietnamese Language with Master Ling
description:
Learn Vietnamese from Master Ling in 10 minutes a day! 

DOWNLOAD FREE - LEARN WITH GAMES - SPEAK WITH NATIVE SPEAKERS

Our free Vietnamese language learning app is designed to make learning Vietnamese as easy and as fun as possible! Using a variety of mini games and interactive learning techniques, you‚Äôll be able to immerse yourself in the Vietnamese language using just your smartphone! 

Whether you‚Äôre a complete beginner and don‚Äôt know any Vietnamese words and you want to learn the basics of the language, or you‚Äôre already pretty fluent and want to learn advanced Vietnamese or brush up on your knowledge ‚Äì Ling has you covered! 

Traditional Vietnamese language lessons can be boring, dull and no fun at all. At Ling, we‚Äôve made the learning process fun by using puzzles, games, challenges and quizzes to teach you how to read, write and speak Vietnamese! 

-------------------------------------------------------
OUR VIETNAMESE TEACHING MINI GAMES‚Ä¶
-------------------------------------------------------
- Flashcards
- Word quizzes
- Chatbot to practise conversation
- Speaking to improve your pronunciation
- Writing practice using your finger and smartphone screen
- Review what you have learned
- Dialogue: Practical conversation in real life
- Match pictures with the corresponding word
- Sort sentences into the correct order
- Complete the unfinished sentence
‚Ä¶ And much, much more! 

With so many different mini games, challenges, quizzes and puzzles to teach you Vietnamese, you‚Äôll have hours of fun learning a new language. It may not feel like learning at all! 

--------------------------------
LING ‚Äì HIGHLIGHTS
--------------------------------
- User friendly interface is easy to navigate
- Individual courses covering different aspects of the Vietnamese language
- Courses for all fluency levels, from absolute beginner to very advanced
- Mini games, flashcards, challenges and interactive games to help you learn much faster
- Learn Vietnamese using an app that was made by Vietnamese natives
- Assess yourself on Vietnamese speaking and pronunciation 
- Learn useful Vietnamese grammar while playing fun games
- Learn how to write the Vietnamese alphabets
- Learn how to speak about a variety of different topics

Ling is available for 50+ different languages:

Learn Arabic, Learn Chinese, Learn Czech, Learn Dutch, Learn English, Learn French, Learn German, Learn Greek, Learn Hindi, Learn Italian, Learn Japanese, Learn Khmer, Learn Korean, Learn Lithuanian, Learn Malaysian, Learn Norwegian, Learn Portuguese, Learn Russian, Learn Serbian, Learn Slovak, Learn Spanish, Learn Swahili, Learn Tagalog, Learn Thai, Learn Turkish, Learn Vietnamese, Learn Afrikaans, Learn Croatian, Learn Hungarian, Learn Nepali, Learn Indonesian, Learn Mongolian, Learn Urdu, Learn Finnish, Learn Romanian, Learn Bulgarian, Learn Telugu, Learn Georgian, Learn Danish, Learn Bengali, Learn Tamil, Learn Polish, Learn Farsi, Learn Burmese, Learn Malayalam, Learn Punjabi, Learn Swedish, Learn Albanian, Learn Slovenian,...

If you have any suggestions or feedback, please contact us at support@simyasolutions.com. Have fun learning!

we've learnt before they get shattered!

comments: Good mix of context based learning. Seems to introduce new words at a good pace, I+1 style, where it builds on what you've previously learned. It also looks nice, which matters! Seems to be northern dialect based on the pronunciation of gi and the n·∫∑ng tones. Good for me since I'm learning northern dialect!

My experience is VERY good. I personaly had a problem where i was charged yearly instead of monthly. But the team answer was so prompt my problem was solved quickly. I recommend it for the example sentences with vocabulary. The only downside is not having a word list of all voca learned. But they said they are working on ir and there are other features meanwhile. Personally i had to write it down manually but it was do-able. Seriously, fast answering was the best. 5 starts.

I have been locked out of the premium features and can not renew my premium subscription because it is saying i have alreay paid for these features, which I have paid for, i have been a member for at least 3 months. I have reinstalled, logged out and even cancelled and renewed my sub which was a complete waste of time and $13 as nothing helps. I obviously enjoy your app but this is incredibly frustrating
The speaking practice seems really good, but it was constantly telling me to speak slower and occasionally connect to the internet when I'm on a stable wifi connection.

It's a great app, the listening portion seems to be spot on according to my Vietnamese friend I tried it with. My friend did point out that the pictures for the speaking part don't really Match the vocabulary very well. One example is the sentence was about the boy drinking coffee, and it's just a picture of the a coffee cup. I have tried a few apps to practice Vietnamese, and so far I am really impressed with this one.

title: Forest: Stay focused
description:
‚òÖ Google Play 2015-2016 Best App of the Year
‚òÖ 2018 Google Play Editors‚Äô Choice Top Productivity App
‚òÖ Google Play 2018 Best Social Impact App Nomination
‚òÖ 2018 Google Play Best Self-improvement app in Canada, Mexico, France, Russia, Brazil, Japan, Korea, India, and Thailand!

Can't stop scrolling? Keep off your phone with the cutest focus timer, and unleash your productivity along with 4 million satisfied paying users.

üåüWelcome to Forest, the place where procrastination does not exist!üåü

Staying focused has never been harder in this world of digital distractions. From phone calls to text messages, your attention is constantly being diverted. 

Plant a tree when you need to stay focused. If you commit to your task without getting distracted, your tree grows; if you cannot resist the temptation to use your phone, your tree dies. Over time, you will have an entire forest built from your focus and commitment. 

Free yourself from obsessive scrolling and achieve your goals!

GET MOTIVATEDüí™
‚Ä¢ Break phone addiction and form productive habits.
‚Ä¢ Earn rewards by staying focused and unlock adorable trees!
‚Ä¢ Grow your very own forest with each tree representing your efforts.
‚Ä¢ View your daily/weekly/monthly/yearly progress and learn about your own focus habits.
‚Ä¢ Concentrate on a daily routine and manage ADHD.

FOCUS LIKE A PRO ‚úçÔ∏è 
Activate Pro version and access more exciting features that will help you concentrate and procrastinate no more:

‚Ä¢ Plant real trees on Earth with our partner, Trees for the Future - We've planted over 800,000 real trees so far!üå≤
‚Ä¢ Set up a customized whitelist - 
leaving Forest and using apps added to the whitelist will not kill your tree.
‚Ä¢ Categorize your tasks with tags and see how you allocated your time.
‚Ä¢ Track your phone usage and screen time.
‚Ä¢ Compete with users around the world.
‚Ä¢ Plant with friends - If one of you fail to stay focused, you'll all get a dead tree!

Plant a tree and start building life-changing habits with Forest!

NOTICE
‚Ä¢ Forest is available for Android mobile and tablet devices, and can be accessed across all Android devices with Pro version. To download the non-Android version of Forest requires a separate purchase. However, by logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms.
‚Ä¢ Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. 

Permissions Explained: https://www.forestapp.cc/permissions/en/

CONNECT WITH US
Follow us on Instagram: @forest_app
Follow us on Twitter: @forestapp_cc

We also have a chrome extension. Find out more at www.forestapp.cc!

developerAddress: 28F., No. 218, Sec. 2, Taiwan Blvd., West Dist., Taichung City 403, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Some bug fixes.
comments: I've been using this app for 2 years and almost unlocking all the trees. It was very helpful. After the new updates, it lost me as a user. Since I don't have "pro version" all the tress I had unlocked were refund and I lost all of them. The only ones I have are the free version trees. I am very upset and disappointed in changes. Not longer does this app care for their users, they only care about profits.

It's a great app as always. BUT for those who wanna update it to the latest version, DON'T DO IT. The latest system don't allow us to buy other species without paying for premium. Unlocking different type of trees is what keep motivating us to focus on the priorities. Without premium, there left only few typical trees in the store. As a student who's still financially independent like many others, I try not to spend any coins or cash on any apps no matter the price. I wish u can change it back.

Amazing app. Got me to focus during a very difficult time, and has continued to do so ever since. Well worth the cheap price for premium, but completely usable without buying. Brilliant support: Some of my data went missing at one point, and I had a friendly reply and full data restoration within 3 days. Suggestion: Being able to give a single tree multiple labels would be even better.

Simple, cool app. Nice visualization for staying on task for long projects. It's weird that the friends feature is only for premium users. I feel like giving that option to free users would encourage much more people to start using the app, considering how friends get people invested in competitions like this, but aside from that it's worth the download at least. That missing feature is the only immediate reason for giving 4 instead of 5 stars

Someone suggested the app the me and I recently started using it. I LOVE the concept and it's super nice to be able to be motivated to stay focused. However what makes me quite sad is not that I cannot buy different species of trees, it's more that without premium, we can't help to plant real trees... I wish they would allow all user the be able to plan real trees, even if we have to watch an ad for every tree, I think it would be worth it.

title: Talk Now- You Can Talk - Text to speech- Speak
description:
Now you can use your Phone and Tablet to talk. if you have lost the ability to talk or you are on bed and not able to talk then you can use this app to talk.
There are many predefined phrase that you can tap to have spoken. Talk now comes pre-loaded with common phrase and categories.
You can use Talk now to type text and let it spoken by your phone and tablet.For parents of young children, especially children who are having trouble vocalizing. This app can be customize to give them voice and let them share their expression.

We are always here to hear for suggestions and request. If you have any Trouble using this app Let us know.

title: Cool Apps - Speaking Battery Alert Alarm
description:
This battery alarm notification app is extremely handy to alert you while charging phone and on low battery. Besides being an exquisite low battery notification alarm, it also gives a high temperature warning based on your settings. Get a full battery alarm or low battery alert in the neatest way possible!

üó£Ô∏èGET COOL SPOKEN BATTERY NOTIFICATION ALARMS
Don‚Äôt you ever get bored from checking the status of battery level? Not to mention that sometimes you might miss the low battery notification because your eyes are not always on the screen. Here is where our low battery alarm app comes in play.

Our neat and highly useful low or battery full charge alarm app will speak below voice messages in different languages.

Get notifications like:
"Mobile Battery is 80% charged. Please unplug charger."
"Mobile Battery is low."


‚ô®Ô∏èHIGH TEMPERATURE WARNING
Besides being a handy battery is low or full battery alarm, we designed our tool to help you with perfect temperature maintenance. Receive battery temperature warnings and battery temperature notifications  and protect your battery and smartphone when needed.
Sample of a Temperature Warning with Notification:
"Temperature alert warning : 37.7 ¬∞C / 100.0 ‚Ñâ"


üîãOUR BATTERY ALERT & BATTERY NOTIFICATION APP FEATURES:

1. Easy to use
2. Lightweight low or full battery notification application with insignificant power consumption 
3. New improved look and feel
4. Voice and Alarm Notification 
6. Additional battery information such as health, temperature, voltage , capacity etc.
7. Supports Android Version 4.0
8. Chart for daily and Historical charge details with zoom in / out with dual touch 
9. Temperature alert and historical charts
10. No special permission required
11. Automatic start on reboot
12. App and Voice Alert support in different languages

WHY YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE COOL APPS - SPEAKING BATTERY ALERT ALARM:

1. Helps to avoid overcharging

2. Protects and prolongs battery life

3. Battery chart with Temperature

4. Easy to use

5. Battery Temperature warning

Our low battery warning notification app requires the below permissions:

1. Run at startup
2. Full Network access
3. Read External Storage (To read external alarm ringtones for alarm alerts only )

How to Use:

1. Once installed, follow the Onboarding process to select alert type
2. If Voice notification selected, then select language for Voice
3. If Alarm Notification selected, then select custom ringtone.
4. If Notification selected, then allow notification for App.
5. Please validate setup from Onboarding or from Settings.

Now it‚Äôs time to protect your battery.

--- > Download the ultimate speaking battery charging notification app now for FREE! 


Important Note: 

1. Make sure that Speaking Battery App is excluded from any task killer programs.


2. NOTICE FOR XIAOMI, OPPO USERS: In the security settings given by Xiaomi & Oppo default, please include the app for auto start. In some phones, you need to turn on auto start option in background run setting.

3. If Voice notification not working, then check Google Text-to-Speech with English language app installed or not.
( https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.tts )
4. If you are running app in Android 8.0 (Orio) or above version, please disable battery optimization for this app to avoid any issues.
Settings -> Apps and Notification -> Special App Access -> Battery Optimization -> Battery Alert -> Don't optimize


=============================================================

To become beta user please use this link: 

https://play.google.com/apps/testing/app.fun.batteryutility

comments: Like the app but am puzzled by the batt level alert setting being limited to 5% chunks. Hard to believe that saves anything with the coding effort. At any rate, I would prefer to start getting alerts at 5% batt left and every 1% thereafter. I bet a lot of people would. Just sayin :)

I've used this app for a long while now, and never had any problems until recently, on my Note 10+, the voice alert will randomly alternate between UK English, and American English, which is strange, as the settings are on UK English, but apart from that annoying little bug, it works perfectly.

It was easy to set up even for an old old idiot like me. I barely know how to answer the phone or text. My phone scares me sometimes. I need to become more familiar it I guess. I'll mess with it for a while and I'm sure that I will catch on eventually. Please pray for me. I'm not the smartest guy in the world but I ain't retarded either. I didn't pla Iy sports in high school but I did wear a helmet.
This actually works!!!! I get a voice alert now at 20 and 80%. An app worth paying for.
Really a very nice app. I am fully satisfied with its performance. Five star rating continues ,it deserves.

title: Text to Speech (TTS) - Your text to speech app
description: At some point in your life, did you need someone to say something for you? Your problems are solved with TTS, the application that converts your text into voice. With this application you can also use voices in several languages, change the read speed and voice pitch and share your speeches as audio in other applications. What are you waiting to try it?
descriptionHTML: At some point in your life, did you need someone to say something for you? Your problems are solved with TTS, the application that converts your text into voice. With this application you can also use voices in several languages, change the read speed and voice pitch and share your speeches as audio in other applications. What are you waiting to try it?
summary: TTS is the app that allows you to read any text you write
recentChanges: Added Portuguese language
comments: I was using it for my Bible study. I'm unable to speak and enjoyed using it. I uninstalled it because you took away the option of a male voice. I'm not a woman.

Have a problem which is really annoying. It's fun and all and helped me when I was too lazy to read longer text, but when I for example played around with the voices so they sound funny and then proceeded to send the audio file to a friend it would randomly cut off. For example I wanted it to say "Amen", then send it to a friend, what did the audio play in the end? Just a simple "Ah". Please fix that and I'll install again!
works very well. Due to 2 strokes I have problems reading. I use this app daily. Never had any problems with the app ever. I would give it 10 stars. I am blessed to have it.
I really enjoy using this. It's simple and efficient, my only problem is there is no clear button so I have to manually erase. But besides that, I love it
Dosent work over a certain text length.

title: A Better Speaker
description:
Do you feel the need to improve your speech and presentation technique? Jonathan Tilley is a professional speaker and voice-over artist from the US with the experience and know-how to help you. In the course of 11 exercises he will unfold the mystery behind successful, clear and confident speech and unleash your presentation potential. The exercises were developed and conceived together with the author, Jonathan Agar, also an experienced voice-over artist and actor. 

This app is the new and improved way to a better command of the spoken word. The exercises address posture, vocal technique, breathing, articulation, consonants, vowels and presentation. 

The basis version of the app includes an introduction, warm-up activities and 10 other exercises from the different categories. There are around 20 minutes of audio material to help you complete the exercises correctly and exactly. Try it out and you will learn the tricks of the trade used by professionals at the top of their game. 

When you buy in-app supplements you will gain access to almost 2.5 hours of further audio material. Do you need to work on basic breathing techniques or perhaps on your posture? Then all you have to do is buy the corresponding chapters to get the optimum mixture for you and your needs. If you like a challenge, then why not try some of our tongue twisters in the articulation sections? Of course there is the option of taking the whole bundle so you don‚Äôt miss out on any of the essential information. 

Alongside the written and spoken contents there are comprehensive video sections and you can even record your own voice and play it back to make sure you are on the right track. This extraordinary device offers so much more than a book or a cd which are often in a much higher price range. 

Maybe you are interested in improving your vocal capabilities, or perhaps you have to speak in front of an audience every week? What if you just want to tackle a problem with pronunciation, or maybe you work as a professional speaker and you feel the need freshen up your technique? This is the right app for you. You will be surprised at how much fun speaking can be. 

At this point I would like to pitch in a special thanks to our actors Sandrine Mittelst√§dt and Dominic Boeer for the great photos that accompany the exercises. 

Features: 
+ Introduction 
+ Warm-up 
+ 10 Exercises from the varying categories 

Shop: 
+ 9 further packages, each containing 11 exercises available to buy in-app 
OR 
+ Package bundle for the remaining 9 packages available to buy in-app 

+++ A total of nearly 2.5 hours of audio material to guide and optimize your experience

title: MarLuc (ayuda logopedia)
description:
Este programa gratuito pretende ser un ayuda en el aprendizaje del lenguaje y apoyar la labor del terapeuta y el trabajo en casa. Permite escuchar las palabras a diferentes velocidades para aquellos que tienen problemas para captar los matices de la pronunciaci√≥n. Diversos estudios indican que esta ralentizaci√≥n permite mejorar la asimilaci√≥n de las palabras, para luego ir incrementando la velocidad hasta ser capaces de captar correctamente los matices de las palabras a la velocidad normal a las que las pronunciamos. 

( Ver presentaci√≥n en https://view.genial.ly/58e75a498b5bcf2aa4730c71/interactive-content-marluc )

Utiliza el reconocedor de voz de tu dispositivo m√≥vil para ayudarte a hacer los ejercicios. El reconocedor puede ayudar a practicar palabras o frases completas y detectar en qu√© palabras puede haber dificultades. 

Puedes ver las opciones en esta  ayuda interactiva  
 

El programa dispone de varias opciones:

- Dispone del sonido real de m√°s de 8.000 palabras para poder practicar la pronunciaci√≥n (Gracias a Scott Roberts por cederlas de forma desinteresada)

- Estas palabras se pueden escuchar a diferentes velocidades para captar las diferencias del sonido dentro de una palabra. Esto puede ayudar a las personas que por alg√∫n motivo tienen problemas para captar los matices a la velocidad normal a la que pronunciamos las palabras.

- Incluye reconocimiento de voz, para comprobar si se pronuncian bien los ejercicios con palabras o frases

- Se puede elegir una palabra o bien practicar por tipo de palabra; alveolares, bilabiales, etc. o elegir el fonema que se desee

- La aplicaci√≥n permite anotar los resultados al practicar y envi√°rselos al terapeuta para que est√© al tanto de la evoluci√≥n en casa y planificar la siguiente consulta.

- Permite anotar los resultados en casa y enviarlos por email al terapeuta

- Esta app es totalmente gratuita y sin anuncios

- Orientada a servir de apoyo en tareas de logopedia y foniatr√≠a.

(Esta aplicaci√≥n requiere Wifi o conexi√≥n de datos para funcionar.)

title: dataDex - Pok√©dex for Pok√©mon
description:
dataDex is an unofficial, beautifully designed Pok√©dex app for everyone to use.
It contains detailed data on every single Pok√©mon, for every main series game ever released, including  Sword & Shield and Isle of Armor DLC and Let's Go Pikachu & Eevee!

Multi-language support:
- English, Italian, German, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Hebrew
- Data only: Japanese, Chinese

Features:

Use the Pokeball multi-button to easily search, filter and sort the Pok√©mon, Move, Ability, Item or Nature you're looking for!
Filter Pok√©mon by game version, generation and/or type to focus your results!
dataDex also works OFFLINE, no internet connection required.

Pok√©dex
A fully featured Pok√©dex that includes detailed data on every single Pok√©mon.
Includes full entries, types, abilities, moves and so much more!

Team Builder (PRO feature)
A fully featured Team Builder - create your Pok√©mon dream team.
Choose a name, game version and up to 6 Pok√©mon to get a full team analysis,
Including team stats, type relations and move type coverage.
Tap any Pok√©mon in your party to customize even further with:
Nickname, gender, ability, moves, level, happiness, nature,
held item, stats, EVs, IVs and even your personal notes!

Location Dex
A fully featured Location Dex - Find out which Pok√©mon can be 
caught in each location, by which method, at what levels and more!

Move Dex
A list of all moves from all games.
Filter moves by generation, type and category!
Get the most important data in a glance, or tap on a move to get even more data!
Learn what Pok√©mon can learn each move quickly!

Ability Dex
A list of all abilities from all games.
Filter abilities by generation!
Tap on a ability to see all data!
Learn what Pok√©mon can have each ability!

Item Dex
A list of all items from all games.
Tap on an item to see all data!

Type Dex
Choose any combination of types to view its weaknesses and resistances!

Nature Dex
A list of all available natures.
Learn how each nature effect your Pok√©mon!

Favorites and Caught checklist
Easily mark any Pok√©mon as favorite or caught 
for quick and useful managment of your collection!

--

* Disclaimer *

dataDex is an unofficial, free fan made app and is NOT affiliated, endorsed or supported by Nintendo, GAME FREAK or The Pok√©mon company in any way.
Some images used in this app are copyrighted and are supported under fair use.
Pok√©mon and Pok√©mon character names are trademarks of Nintendo.
No copyright infringement intended.

Pok√©mon ¬© 2002-2020 Pok√©mon. ¬© 1995-2020 Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc.

A beautifully designed Pok√©dex.
Detailed data all 893 Pok√©mon.
recentChanges:
v3.9.8: * The Crown Tundra - DLC support update *
‚Ä¢ Added: Location Dex support for The Crown Tundra DLC
‚Ä¢ The Crown Tundra DLC now fully supported with new Pok√©mon, abilities, moves, items, full move pools, Team Builder and now Location Dex support!
‚Ä¢ Missing Pok√©dex entries for returning Pok√©mon will be added soon
comments: Pretty enjoyable, better than checking Bulbapedia multiple times for sure. Being able to check locations, sprites, moveset, type matchups, BST from all of the 890+ pok√©mon with no problems at all, is really satisfying. Interface is pretty solid, and even thinking that having to pay for the premium to use dark mode (who I'm a huge fan of), is still not a big of a deal, and for sure won't make me dislike this app at all. Probably my favorite Pok√©dex app I have ever seen. Keep up the good work! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ú®

I love this app, and all of the team builders that I can save. Its great for my mind that won't shut up. My only issue is that for the team builder, I can't select regional forms of pokemon for my team (i.e. Galarian Ponyta). I can evolve some (i.e. Pikachu) to it's regional form, but not the ones that don't have a split evolution. Aside from that, its a wonderfully made app with frequent updates!

This is amazing!! I can look at the locations and for the upper gens 5-8, I can actually check the area, like for Sword and Shield, not only does it tell me where the pokemon appears in, but I can see the conditions such as "It only appears when it's raining". If I have one problem though, it has to be the cries of the gen 8 pokemon. They sound very low quality and in some cases, it sounds a bit like your device's speaker is broken. Crown Tundra is here, aling with the locations!

This app literally has everything you could possibly want in a pokedex app. It has a full pokedex/itemdex for information and location, and team building with in depth analysis of weaknesses and coverage. There is nothing left out! I dont see how any other app can compete with what dataDex offers. Not to mention they update the app often so they are always giving the most new and accurate information! 5/5 EZ

Very nice app, and it could be great! Would love to see the ability to search through all available swsh pokemon, and not have them broken up by galar/isle of armor/crown tundra. It's super nice that I can sort the dex by a stat, but i wish i could sort every pokemon. Also, there are some issues with the move dex. I don't think that the "Pokemon who learn this move" works right. I'd also love to be able to sort by moves available in swsh. Not just moves introduced in swsh, and no removed ones.

title: Analyze Body Language
description:
Communication is a two-way process.  The main elements forming the communication process include the encoder, message, channel, receiver, and feedback.

	It is not an easy task to decipher what a person is actually saying or feeling in the present moment. Communication process refers to a combination of what you hear and see in the current situation, based on which you draw a conclusion.



	It is easy to see the obvious. But, have you ever tried to decipher the actual meaning of something that is being said.  Body language is the art of decoding the non -  verbal communication which is transmitted through the speaker‚Äôs gestures, foot position, smile, facial expressions, and several other body movements.

	These microexpressions and gestures create an immediate impact on the receiver. The way you move, look, listen, and react helps the other person understand if you are communicating honestly and listening to the other person. People‚Äôs body language unravels more than what is communicated through words.

	Non-verbal communication develops trust, a good rapport and facilitates transparency. A wrong body language creates suspicion, tension, and confusion that lead to conflicts. 

	In this entertaining app, you shall learn about the secret of body language, which will help you gain confidence and the ability to control any situation ‚Äì from negotiating with a business client to building a strong personal relationship.


This app includes:
Part 1: The Importance Of Body Language
Why Body Language Is Important
Express Your Feelings
Origin Of Nonverbal Signals
Hand Gestures - Cultural Differences

Part 2: Subcategories Of Body Language
Haptics
Proxemics
Distance Zones
Geographic Territory
Angles Made By The Body
Stance
Tips To Make A Good Presentation With Your Body Language
The Power Of Pause
Oculesics

Part 3: Gestures And Their Significance
The Significance
Facial Expressions
Head Gestures
Head Position
Head Shrug
Hand Gestures
Palms Position
Leg Gestures
Foot Position

Part 4: Learn To Decode Various Different Expressions
Arm-Crossing On Chest
Double-Arm Grip
Nail Biting
Hand On Your Cheek
Touching Your Nose
Rubbing Hands Briskly
Steepling
Clenched Hands
Head Covered With Hands
Hands Behind Your Back
Thumb Signals
Mouth Cover
Sshhhh
Itchy Nose
Rubbing One Eye
Hand Supporting The Side Of The Head

Part 5: Eyes Are Mirrors
The Eyebrow Flash
Glance
Blinking
Darting Eyes
Gazing
Power Stare

descriptionHTML:
Communication is a two-way process. The main elements forming the communication process include the encoder, message, channel, receiver, and feedback.

It is not an easy task to decipher what a person is actually saying or feeling in the present moment. Communication process refers to a combination of what you hear and see in the current situation, based on which you draw a conclusion.



It is easy to see the obvious. But, have you ever tried to decipher the actual meaning of something that is being said. Body language is the art of decoding the non - verbal communication which is transmitted through the speaker‚Äôs gestures, foot position, smile, facial expressions, and several other body movements.

These microexpressions and gestures create an immediate impact on the receiver. The way you move, look, listen, and react helps the other person understand if you are communicating honestly and listening to the other person. People‚Äôs body language unravels more than what is communicated through words.

Non-verbal communication develops trust, a good rapport and facilitates transparency. A wrong body language creates suspicion, tension, and confusion that lead to conflicts.

In this entertaining app, you shall learn about the secret of body language, which will help you gain confidence and the ability to control any situation ‚Äì from negotiating with a business client to building a strong personal relationship.


This app includes:

title: PictogramAgenda
description:
What is a Visual Schedule?

Visual schedules are excellent tools in the learning process for people with certain developmental disorders such as Pervasive Developmental Disorders (PDD) or Autism Spectrum Disorders (ASD).
 
These people are usually excellent visual thinkers. They understand and retain better the information presented to them visually.
 
Visual schedules are based on the sequential presentation of a series of tasks, clear and simplified form, using for this normally pictograms to facilitate the schematic representation without unnecessary additional information.
 
Visual schedules help these people understand the situations and know what is expected of them, thereby reducing the anxiety that generates the new and unexpected. With visual schedules you help them to anticipate the various events that will happen. Using this type of schedules you help them to give an order to their world and improve aspects of their emotional wellbeing.


What is PictogramAgenda?

PictogramAgenda is a software application that facilitates the generation and use of visual schedules on terminals (mobile phones or tablets) based on the Android operating system.

PictogramAgenda allows to set up and order a sequence of images (maximum 12) to form the visual schedule (agenda).

The application screen is arranged in three parts: at the top are the images loaded orderly and numbered to represent clearly the order of the tasks. The center of the screen needs to be pressed each time you want to move to the next task, showing current image or pictogram in a larger size to highlight. The images of the work already done will be going to the bottom of the screen in reduced size, as a reminder of the tasks performed.

The application includes some sample pictograms with usual situations of daily life of children (breakfast, go to school, etc.). These images are taken from ARASAAC, which is the Aragonese Website of Augmentative and Alternative Communication, where you can find extensive catalogs of pictograms, among other interesting resources. Their web address is:

http://catedu.es/arasaac/catalogos.php

PictogramAgenda includes only some of these pictograms, but provides the possibility for the application user to load any image or photo stored on the terminal as a pictogram.


Summary of key features:

- Up to 12 pictograms from sample pictograms provided or examining the device for any image file supported by Android.
- At any time you can change the order of the remaining tasks by simply dragging the pictogram to its new position.
- Supports portrait and landscape orientation.
- Allows to cross pictograms out, to emphasize the fact that a task is NOT to be performed.
- If needed you can go back to previous pictogram or return to the initial status with all pending tasks.
- You can save and load agendas generated for later use. They are stored in the device's SD card folder "PictogramAgenda". 
- Messages or texts of the application can be displayed in:  English, Spanish, Dutch, French, German.

>>> Version 2.0:

- TEXT (show titles of the pictograms)
- SOUND (titles of the pictograms are read with android 'Text to Speech' functionality)

---

All the information about the application:
http://www.lorenzomoreno.com/software/pictogramagenda

---

License / Terms of Use:

PictogramAgenda is a Freeware application created by Lorenzo Moreno. Anyone can use it for free.
Commercial use of it is not allowed.
The application is provided "as is" without warranty or liability of any kind.

title: Audio MP3 Cut Mix Merge & Speech to Text & TTS
description:
Before buying, please firstly try out the free version at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.playwfd.avtools. After confirming that the free version has no problem on your phone, then decide whether to buy the Pro version. The difference between them is the free version can only access the output audio inside the application.

Audio Tools can be used to manipulate audio files:
1. Extract audio from a video file
2. Cut audio by setting a start and end point
3. Join/merge multiple audio files with fade in or fade out
4. Mix multiple audio files with different volume setting
5. Change audio rate or tempo
It supports the mainstream audio codec: mp3, aac, opus, speex, amr, wma, flac, etc. The output supports M4A/MP3/AMR codec with different compression level

For Chinese/English, it also can help on
1. ASR: automated speech recognition, convert audio/speech file content into text
2. TTS: text to speech, convert a text content into MP3 audio file directly

title: Speak (Ïä§ÌîΩ): English Conversations & Speaking
description:
You're still struggling with your speaking even though you've studied English for a long time? 

You have high TOEIC scores but you can't keep a conversation with a native speaker for more than 3 minutes?

It's a simple truth that most people just can't seem to get good at speaking English. 

The problem is we never get a chance to practice speaking because we've only focused on grammar and exams. 

-

Speak is an app that helps you get more comfortable speaking English out loud by letting you practice speaking out loud more than any existing method. 

Speak‚Äôs process is simple: 

1. Introduce you to Real English that is essential to every day English conversations 
2. Have you say variations of each phrase so many times you say it without thinking 
3. Simulate real situations where you‚Äôd actually use it 

Whenever you‚Äôre using Speak, you‚Äôll be speaking a ton ‚Äî and the app will always be listening and providing feedback to make sure you fix mistakes. 

Just like if you were learning how to swim, you‚Äôd go in a pool instead of reading a swimming book, if you want to get good at Speaking English, you‚Äôre gonna have to start actually speaking and do it every day! Speak makes this realistic.

--

If you have any feedback or questions, please contact us at feedback@usespeak.com. 

Terms of Service: http://usespeak.com/tos
Privacy Policy: http://usespeak.com/privacy

title: Speak n Talk Calculator Lite
description:
*Your favorite speaking calculator is now updated with a brand new look, a calculation history view, and mute function!*

--First uninstall and then install the new update if you are experiencing problems with the update process.


Usage:
To do 1+1 say: one plus one
To do 1-1 say: one minus one
To do 1x1 say: one times one
To do 1/1 say: one divided by one


Ever wanted to tell a calculator to do a calculation with just your voice? or wanted to listen to the calculation to make sure you have entered the correct calculation? Speak n Talk Calculator can do that for you! 

Speak n Talk Calculator can recognize spoken compounded mathematical equations. For example, you can say what's negative 2 plus 2 times 5 divided 3 minus 4 point 5, -2+2*5/3-4.5? and Speak n Talk Calculator will respond with the correct result. But Wait there is more, you can also use the number keys to type in equations as well! Speak n Talk Calculator can even tell you  jokes, just say "Tell me a Joke"


Let the Speak n Talk Calculator do the Math and Speaking for you!

title: EchoHacks¬Æ Speech Trainer Lite
description:
EchoHacks Speech Trainer enables the user to speak into the microphone and
to hear back the user's own voice through headphones after a specific delay in seconds. 
The voice is echoed back automatically, while standard audio recorders
would require multiple button clicks to duplicate this process.  
(Bluetooth headset supported)

The tool has a wide range of applications and can be used effectively in training 
for accent reduction, foreign language pronunciation, diction, articulation,
singing, public speaking, and interview practice.

Please visit the EchoHacks website to learn how to use the tool effectively 
for your speech training.

EchoHacks Speech Trainer was created by the inventor who wanted to reduce his 
foreign accent, and improve his public speaking skills. He developed the app
after realizing that no tools were available that would assist him to focus on 
deliberate practice (focused high repetition drills) in speech training.

IMPORTANT:
* The app will only function with a phone headset.
* The app is a speech training tool and does not record audio.
* The app will run in the background.

*** TROUBLESHOOTING: Device is not recognizing the headset connection ***
There are some devices that do not auto-detect a headset connection, so the 
the app won't run.  In this case, you can use the SoundAbout app to overwrite 
the default headset setting.  Click on the Media Audio section and select Wired Headset.
In most cases, this will solve this issue.

If you encounter any problems, please leave a message on the website forums
(www.echohacks.com/forums) and we will do our very best to help you.

Application:
speech, speech training, accent, accent training, pronunciation, articulation, speech,
foreign language, public speaking
